name: Divine Crusader
shortDescription: The divine crusader embodies devotion and dedication to a chosen deity.
shortDescriptionHtml: The divine crusader embodies devotion and dedication to a chosen deity.

name: Warpriest
shortDescription: Warpriests are fierce, earthy clerics who pray for peace but prepare for war.
shortDescriptionHtml: Warpriests are fierce, earthy clerics who pray for peace but prepare for war.

name: Church Inquisitor
shortDescription: The church inquisitor uncovers taint within the church and cuts it away.
shortDescriptionHtml: The church inquisitor uncovers taint within the church and cuts it away.

name: Contemplative
shortDescription: Contemplatives devote their lives to cultivating a greater closeness with their deities.
shortDescriptionHtml: Contemplatives devote their lives to cultivating a greater closeness with their deities.

name: Flayerspawn Psychic
shortDescription:
Willing to sacrifice her life, appearance, and even her sanity, the flayerspawn psychic walks a dangerous road, growing in psionic power as she slowly embraces her secret mind flayer heritage. Some psionic characters take up this class to gain more power, while others do so to gain greater understanding of the illithids. A few do so because they secretly believe mind flayers to be a superior psionic organism. 

Potential flayerspawn psychics, whether multiclass or single-classed, must possess psionic ability. Potential flayerspawns are restricted in how they obtain this psionic power�only psions and erudites (page 153) possess the proper frame of mind. From this beginning, potential flayerspawns undergo a slow process, transforming mind and body as they gain and practice abilities common to mind flayers. Unfortunately, this power comes along with the temptation to embrace portions of their heritage that are truly evil (suck as the Illithid Extraction feat, page 61). Those who resist the hunger are capable of maintaining their moral and personal attitudes. Those who give in and indulge the hunger find their personalities changing to more closely match the creature they are becoming.

name: Thayan Gladiator
shortDescription: Popular and skillful gladiators fill the arenas of Faer�n from Calimshan to the Dragon Coast, but the brutal Thayan gladiators are the best of the best.

name: Gray Guard
shortDescription: Gray guards are less restrained by their knightly vows, doing what must be done, no matter how unpleasant.
shortDescriptionHtml: Gray guards are less restrained by their knightly vows, doing what must be done, no matter how unpleasant.

name: Magical Trickster
shortDescription: Relying as much on her wits as on her spellcasting prowess, the magical trickster can sacrifice her spellcasting ability to gain even greater access to skill tricks.
shortDescriptionHtml: Relying as much on her wits as on her spellcasting prowess, the magical trickster can sacrifice her spellcasting ability to gain even greater access to skill tricks.

name: Knight of the Blue Moon
shortDescription: Knights of the Blue Moon are elite soldiers in the endless battle against the Mistress of the Night.
shortDescriptionHtml: Knights of the Blue Moon are elite soldiers in the endless battle against the Mistress of the Night.

name: Justiciar of Taiia
shortDescription: Justiciars of Taiia fulfill the role of carrying out Taiia's sentence against wrongdoers.
shortDescriptionHtml: Justiciars of Taiia fulfill the role of carrying out Taiia's sentence against wrongdoers.

name: Knight of the Middle Circle
shortDescription: Knights of the Middle Circle provide security for Stargazer chapterhouses and may be called upon for similar service for allies of the Stargazers.
shortDescriptionHtml: Knights of the Middle Circle provide security for Stargazer chapterhouses and may be called upon for similar service for allies of the Stargazers.

name: Master of Shrouds
shortDescription:
The master of shrouds is an evil spellcaster who magically seizes incorporeal undead and sets them to do her bidding. Plucking vile creatures such as wraiths and shadows from their restless haunts, she summons them to her presence and commands them to work her will. Furious at their forced servitude, the wrathful undead spread fear and death in their wake.

Most masters of shrouds have experience as clerics. Paladins never become masters of shrouds, though ex-paladins may do so, particularly if they turn far enough from their lawful good roots to become blackguards. Multiclass clerics are also common followers of this path, including cleric/fighters and cleric/rogues. A small number of cleric/necromancer/mystic theurges take up the role of master of shrouds at their highest levels.

NPC masters of shrouds operate in secret, pursuing their evil plans under cover of darkness. They may work individually or in groups, depending on their assignment. They rarely stay in one place for long, and rarely work in groups larger than four, to avoid attracting too much attention from paladins and good clerics, not to mention hunters of the dead.

name: Eye of Lolth
shortDescription: The eyes of Lolth are stealthy servants and watchers faithful to the Church of Lolth.
shortDescriptionHtml: The eyes of Lolth are stealthy servants and watchers faithful to the Church of Lolth.

name: Trapsmith
shortDescription:
Many adventurers view traps as nuisances�just more obstacles to be overcome�but some see traps as an art form. Similar to a rogue in many respects, a trapsmith hones her craft to a level of perfection that few can hope to emulate. Simple and crude traps offend her, and complicated death traps cause her to leap about (cautiously, of course) in wonderment and joy. More than just an expert at disarming devices, a trapsmith excels at rigging deadly surprises to harm her enemies, secure her camp, and confound pursuers.

A trapsmith needs a high number of skills and the trapfinding class feature, so many members of this prestige class begin their careers as rogues. Other classes can qualify, including ninjas, scouts, and spellthieves (all from _Complete Adventurer_), factotums (see page 14), and rangers who have the trap expert alternative class feature (see page 12). But rogues have the easiest time of it.

Because the trapsmith is a skill-based character, she must have a high Intelligence score. A high Dexterity score also proves to be of great value, adding to a number of her skills.

shortDescription: Some druids, especially among the Greensingers or those who have dealt extensively with that sect, reject narrow interpretations of what constitutes the natural world.

name: Adept
shortDescription: This NPC class possesses a combination of arcane and divine skills.
shortDescriptionHtml: This NPC class possesses a combination of arcane and divine skills.

name: Eidoloncer
shortDescription: This variant class for ghosts emphasizes spellcasting abilities.
shortDescriptionHtml: This variant class for ghosts emphasizes spellcasting abilities.

name: Duskblade
shortDescription: If you find you can't choose between being an arcane spellcaster who zaps your enemies with powerful spells and a nimble, powerful front-line melee character who lays them low with a sword, the duskblade is the perfect class for you.
shortDescriptionHtml: If you find you can't choose between being an arcane spellcaster who zaps your enemies with powerful spells and a nimble, powerful front-line melee character who lays them low with a sword, the duskblade is the perfect class for you.

name: Shadowcaster
shortDescription: The shadowcaster understands the true, primal power of darkness, attunes herself to the Plane of Shadow, and learns great shadow mysteries the equal of any mundane spell.
shortDescriptionHtml: The shadowcaster understands the true, primal power of darkness, attunes herself to the Plane of Shadow, and learns great shadow mysteries the equal of any mundane spell.

name: Planar Ranger
shortDescription: A variant ranger who roams the multiverse instead of the wilderness.
shortDescriptionHtml: A variant ranger who roams the multiverse instead of the wilderness.

name: Fist of Raziel
shortDescription: The fists of Raziel represent a knightly order dedicated to the celestial patron of holy warfare against evil.
shortDescriptionHtml: The fists of Raziel represent a knightly order dedicated to the celestial patron of holy warfare against evil.

name: Slayer of Domiel
shortDescription: Sometimes the skillset of an assassin is required for more noble pursuits.
shortDescriptionHtml: Sometimes the skillset of an assassin is required for more noble pursuits.

name: Diabolist
shortDescription: A diabolist does not serve devils -- she wants to be one.
shortDescriptionHtml: A diabolist does not serve devils — she wants to be one.

name: Forest Reeve
shortDescription: Forest reeves are chosen by Guardians of the Green to patrol local wilderness areas to check for dangers and humanoid activities that could be harmful to the land.
shortDescriptionHtml: Forest reeves are chosen by Guardians of the Green to patrol local wilderness areas to check for dangers and humanoid activities that could be harmful to the land.

name: Stormlord
shortDescription: Stormlords often live as brigands, indulging their personal desires for wealth, food, luxury items, and wanton behavior as they crave random, spectacular acts of violence.
shortDescriptionHtml: Stormlords often live as brigands, indulging their personal desires for wealth, food, luxury items, and wanton behavior as they crave random, spectacular acts of violence.

name: Temple Raider of Olidammara
shortDescription: The temple raiders are an elite cadre of thieves who worship the Laughing Rogue and specialize in stealing valuables and secret lore from the temples of other deities.
shortDescriptionHtml: The temple raiders are an elite cadre of thieves who worship the Laughing Rogue and specialize in stealing valuables and secret lore from the temples of other deities.

name: Zerth Cenobite
shortDescription:
The core of a zerth cenobites studies involve strict meditation on the nature of time and the body's movements through it, culminating in a martial art known as zerthin. Zerthin was first used at a special githzerai monastery called Zerth'Ad'Lun, located deep in the chaos-boil of Limbo. The chronal art has since been disseminated more widely, however. 

Zerthin teaches that though the passage of time allows events to become chaotic and uncontrolled, a disciplined mind filled with a reservoir of psionic power can view the time stream as just one more dimension of space. This privileged point of view allows a zerth cenobite to see a moment or two into the past and future, thereby gaining insight as to where to place her next blow and how to best dodge the next blow of her foe. Practitioners of zerthin claim to be able to peer into the future, enhancing their martial expertise to unmatched heights.

Almost all zerth cenobites are monks who have gained the knowledge necessary to begin studying the rarefied art of zerthin. Many are githzerai, since zerthin was developed first in Zerth'Ad'Lun on Limbo, but after the first zerth cenobite broke the stricture and began teaching zerthin to nongithzerai, all the censure and displeasure of Limbo couldn't keep zerthin a purely githzerai psionic ability.

name: Battle Trickster
shortDescription: The battle trickster engages in combat not only to defeat enemies but to impress them with martial and acrobatic prowess.
shortDescriptionHtml: The battle trickster engages in combat not only to defeat enemies but to impress them with martial and acrobatic prowess.

name: Dark Hunter
shortDescription: Dark hunters specialize in hunting down and eliminating creatures in the dark, twisting caves of the Underdark.
shortDescriptionHtml: Dark hunters specialize in hunting down and eliminating creatures in the dark, twisting caves of the Underdark.

name: Exotic Weapon Master
shortDescription: The only real requirement for exotic weapon master is commitment and perseverance.
shortDescriptionHtml: The only real requirement for exotic weapon master is commitment and perseverance.

name: Mindspy
shortDescription: By reading the minds of her enemies, a mindspy knows exactly what they're going to do a fraction of a second before they do it.
shortDescriptionHtml: By reading the minds of her enemies, a mindspy knows exactly what they're going to do a fraction of a second before they do it.

name: Thayan Knight
shortDescription: Thayan knights have mastered the art of swordplay, are familiar with magic, and are loyal to none but the tattooed mages.
shortDescriptionHtml: Thayan knights have mastered the art of swordplay, are familiar with magic, and are loyal to none but the tattooed mages.

name: Diamond Dragon
shortDescription: The boldest of the sages study the link between gem dragons and psionics, learning to tap into what they refer to as the draconic psionic collective.
shortDescriptionHtml: The boldest of the sages study the link between gem dragons and psionics, learning to tap into what they refer to as the draconic psionic collective.

name: Disciple of Ashardalon
shortDescription: Disciples of Ashardalon bind fiendish spirits to their own hearts, eventually taking on the characteristics of demonic spawn themselves.
shortDescriptionHtml: Disciples of Ashardalon bind fiendish spirits to their own hearts, eventually taking on the characteristics of demonic spawn themselves.

name: Dragonrider
shortDescription: Dragonriders soar through the clouds atop a draconic steed.
shortDescriptionHtml: Dragonriders soar through the clouds atop a draconic steed.

name: Nosomatic Chirurgeon
shortDescription: A nosomatic chirurgeon is a halfling student of sickness, and a master of the ebb and flow of the energies of life and death.
shortDescriptionHtml: A nosomatic chirurgeon is a halfling student of sickness, and a master of the ebb and flow of the energies of life and death.

name: Cyran Avenger
shortDescription: These survivors of the Day of Mourning seek to uncover the cause of the cataclysm and avenge their people against the architects of the Mournland.
shortDescriptionHtml: These survivors of the Day of Mourning seek to uncover the cause of the cataclysm and avenge their people against the architects of the Mournland.

name: Elemental Archon
shortDescription: Elemental archons are servants of powerful, seemingly uncaring elemental forces who want to once and for all tip the balance in favor of their chosen element.
shortDescriptionHtml: Elemental archons are servants of powerful, seemingly uncaring elemental forces who want to once and for all tip the balance in favor of their chosen element.

name: Epic Cleric
shortDescription: An epic master of divine magic and a capable warrior as well.
shortDescriptionHtml: An epic master of divine magic and a capable warrior as well.

name: Epic Fighter
shortDescription: An epic warrior with exceptional combat capability and unequaled skill with weapons.
shortDescriptionHtml: An epic warrior with exceptional combat capability and unequaled skill with weapons.

name: Epic Ranger
shortDescription: An epic cunning, skilled warrior of the wilderness.
shortDescriptionHtml: An epic cunning, skilled warrior of the wilderness.

name: Beguiler
shortDescription: If you delight in manipulating others, either to their disadvantage or for their own good, then the beguiler is the class for you.
shortDescriptionHtml: If you delight in manipulating others, either to their disadvantage or for their own good, then the beguiler is the class for you.

name: Swordsage
shortDescription: A master of martial maneuvers, the sword sage is a physical adept -- a blade wizard whose knowledge of the Sublime Way lets him unlock potent abilities, many of which are overtly supernatural or magical in nature. Depending on which disciplines he chooses to study, a swordsage might be capable of walking through walls, leaping dozens of feet into the air, shattering boulders with a single touch, or even  mastering the elements of fire or shadow. Whatever his specific training, a swordsage blurs the line  between martial prowess and magical skill.
shortDescriptionHtml: A master of martial maneuvers, the sword sage is a physical adept — a blade wizard whose knowledge of the Sublime Way lets him unlock potent abilities, many of which are overtly supernatural or magical in nature. Depending on which disciplines he chooses to study, a swordsage might be capable of walking through walls, leaping dozens of feet into the air, shattering boulders with a single touch, or even mastering the elements of fire or shadow. Whatever his specific training, a swordsage blurs the line between martial prowess and magical skill.

name: Skylord
shortDescription: An elf crusader, the skylord uses his kinship with creatures of the sky and the power of the winds to fight evil.
shortDescriptionHtml: An elf crusader, the skylord uses his kinship with creatures of the sky and the power of the winds to fight evil.

name: Exemplar
shortDescription:
An exemplar is someone who believes that most individuals and creatures possess a wellspring of untapped talent and capability, and that the multiverse would be a better place if only they would all try to live up to their potential. To her mind, the best way to encourage this behavior in others is to exemplify it herself. An exemplar focuses her energy on improving the skills she possesses until she is able to perform them with ?uidity, grace, and art. She believes that even the simplest action (such as climbing a tree or building a chair) can be done with such skill and ?air as to inspire awe and stimulate a desire for self-betterment. No matter what area a particular exemplar excels in, be it walking a tightrope, deciphering forgotten languages, or remembering the names of every arch?end in the Abyss, she performs it with passion and joy. 

Bards are the characters most likely to become exemplars, but wizards, rogues, rangers, and druids sometimes choose this path as well. All of these classes have a fair number of people who believe that their actions can be viewed as art, and like most artists they want to inspire others with their abilities. Clerics, paladins, and monks also choose this prestige class on rare occasions, but their dedication to promoting a philosophy or a higher power sometimes con?icts with the exemplar�s belief that the best way to inspire others is simply to be a good role model.

name: Hospitaler
shortDescription: Hospitalers are a fighting force of necessity, sworn to poverty, obedience, and the defense of those in their care.
shortDescriptionHtml: Hospitalers are a fighting force of necessity, sworn to poverty, obedience, and the defense of those in their care.

name: Rainbow Servant
shortDescription: Those who have learned what the couatl temples have to offer are known as rainbow servants.
shortDescriptionHtml: Those who have learned what the couatl temples have to offer are known as rainbow servants.

name: Void Disciple
shortDescription: Of all the elemental forces that make up the universe, the most powerful and the most difficult to control is the one that lies between and joins the others: Void. Void disciples understand that everything in the world contains all the basic elements, held together by the least tangible essence. Void is like the silence between notes of music, giving rhythm and shape to the whole. To those who understand the relationship of Void to all other things, and who have the innate ability to personally perceive that relationship, distance and form become inconsequential.

Void disciples understand that everything in the world contains all the basic elements, held together by the least tangible essence. Void is like the silence between notes of music, giving rhythm and shape to the whole. To those who understand the relationship of Void to all other things, and who have the innate ability to personally perceive that relationship, distance and form become inconsequential.

name: Blighter
shortDescription: Blighters bring desolation wherever they tread.
shortDescriptionHtml: Blighters bring desolation wherever they tread.

name: Storm Disciple
shortDescription:
A storm disciple is a character who decides that the best, most glorious way to serve his ideals is through the natural power, fury, and splendor of the storm. While he retains knowledge of mantles, he might have come to feel that those mantles are of lesser value than his connection to the storm.

A disciple delights in singing the song of the raging storm, of blackened skies where the thunder is born. He seeks to master the flow of electrical energy that infuses his chosen weapon with power, becoming a conduit for that astonishing energy.

Almost all storm disciples, whether multiclass or single-classed, begin as divine minds or ardents. Ardents are often drawn to the universal truth embodied by the natural world and its energies. For them, becoming a storm disciple is a natural extension of their powers. Most divine minds who become storm disciples, on the other hand, are confident in their ability to serve their deity however they deem most fit, taking on the fury of the storm and their training in its use all on their own.

name: Justiciar
shortDescription: Justiciars make a living kicking the daylights out of criminals who desperately deserve it.
shortDescriptionHtml: Justiciars make a living kicking the daylights out of criminals who desperately deserve it.

name: Tattooed Monk
shortDescription: Certain monastic orders bestow supernatural or spell-like powers on their members by inscribing magic tattoos on their skin. These tattooed monks shave their heads, speak in cryptic riddles and maxims, and--in many cases--travel the countryside furthering their quest for enlightenment by facing and conquering temptation.

These tattooed monks shave their heads, speak in cryptic riddles and maxims, and—in many cases—travel the countryside furthering their quest for enlightenment by facing and conquering temptation.

name: Knight of the Rose
shortDescription: The Knights of the Rose are the highest tier of the Solamnic Knights.
shortDescriptionHtml: The Knights of the Rose are the highest tier of the Solamnic Knights.

name: Knight of the Thorn
shortDescription: The Knights of the Thorn are also known as the "gray robes" for the ash-colored robes they wear to indicate that they do not serve the Orders of High Sorcery.
shortDescriptionHtml: The Knights of the Thorn are also known as the "gray robes" for the ash-colored robes they wear to indicate that they do not serve the Orders of High Sorcery.

name: Righteous Zealot
shortDescription: The righteous zealot is a person with a cause that directs every aspect of life.
shortDescriptionHtml: The righteous zealot is a person with a cause that directs every aspect of life.

name: Wizard of High Sorcery
shortDescription: Once a wizard successfully completes (and survives) the Test of High Sorcery, his choices dictate his robe color and which deity of magic grants him power.
shortDescriptionHtml: Once a wizard successfully completes (and survives) the Test of High Sorcery, his choices dictate his robe color and which deity of magic grants him power.

name: Mystic Theurge
shortDescription: Blurring the line between divine and arcane, mystic theurges draw power from divine sources and musty tomes alike.
shortDescriptionHtml: Blurring the line between divine and arcane, mystic theurges draw power from divine sources and musty tomes alike.

name: Blade of Orien
shortDescription: The blade of Orien is a soldier who uses her Mark of Passage to gain a tactical edge in combat.
shortDescriptionHtml: The blade of Orien is a soldier who uses her Mark of Passage to gain a tactical edge in combat.

name: Cyre Scout
shortDescription: Cyre scouts combine the creative traditions of House Cannith with the ability to survive in the most hazardous environments.
shortDescriptionHtml: Cyre scouts combine the creative traditions of House Cannith with the ability to survive in the most hazardous environments.

name: Unbound Scroll
shortDescription: Unbound scrolls are drawn from the most gifted artificers and wizards of House Sivis, though a few exceptional magewrights have made their way into the order.
shortDescriptionHtml: Unbound scrolls are drawn from the most gifted artificers and wizards of House Sivis, though a few exceptional magewrights have made their way into the order.

name: Heir of Siberys
shortDescription: The magic of a Siberys mark is undeniably powerful, and an heir of Siberys manifests one.
shortDescriptionHtml: The magic of a Siberys mark is undeniably powerful, and an heir of Siberys manifests one.

name: Divine Emissary
shortDescription: Deities have need of powerful servants, many of whom are epic clerics, paladins, and other characters.
shortDescriptionHtml: Deities have need of powerful servants, many of whom are epic clerics, paladins, and other characters.

name: Union Sentinel
shortDescription: A Union Sentinel is a member of an elite police force that guards the demiplane city of Union.
shortDescriptionHtml: A Union Sentinel is a member of an elite police force that guards the demiplane city of Union.

name: Argent Fist
shortDescription: Only a precious few possess the focus, the dedication, and the physical prowess to master the abilities of the argent fist, but few enemies can stand against those who do.
shortDescriptionHtml: Only a precious few possess the focus, the dedication, and the physical prowess to master the abilities of the argent fist, but few enemies can stand against those who do.

name: Techsmith
shortDescription: Techsmiths are devoted to the development of new inventions and the progression of achievement in the name of the Wonderbringer.
shortDescriptionHtml: Techsmiths are devoted to the development of new inventions and the progression of achievement in the name of the Wonderbringer.

name: Primeval
shortDescription: The primeval is a warrior who has tapped into his racial memories to find and forge a bond with an ancient creature.
shortDescriptionHtml: The primeval is a warrior who has tapped into his racial memories to find and forge a bond with an ancient creature.

name: Warmage
shortDescription: A militant spellcaster whose training focuses on battlefield magic.
shortDescriptionHtml: A militant spellcaster whose training focuses on battlefield magic.

name: Wu Jen
shortDescription: A mysterious wizard of the eastern world, whose arcane lore revolves around mastery of the elements.
shortDescriptionHtml: A mysterious wizard of the eastern world, whose arcane lore revolves around mastery of the elements.

name: Duergar Racial Class
shortDescription: The duergar, or gray dwarves, lead lives of neverending toil in great underground foundry-cities.
shortDescriptionHtml: The duergar, or gray dwarves, lead lives of neverending toil in great underground foundry-cities.

name: Eidolon
shortDescription: This variant class for ghosts emphasizes fighting abilities.
shortDescriptionHtml: This variant class for ghosts emphasizes fighting abilities.

name: Truenamer
shortDescription: If you want to understand the secret language of the universe, the truenamer class is for you.
shortDescriptionHtml: If you want to understand the secret language of the universe, the truenamer class is for you.

name: Battle Sorcerer
shortDescription: A variant sorcerer who is a capable physical combatant.
shortDescriptionHtml: A variant sorcerer who is a capable physical combatant.

name: Divine Bard
shortDescription: A variant bard who derives his special power from a divine tradition.
shortDescriptionHtml: A variant bard who derives his special power from a divine tradition.

name: Totem Barbarian
shortDescription: A variant barbarian who dedicates himself to a totem creature.
shortDescriptionHtml: A variant barbarian who dedicates himself to a totem creature.

name: Wilderness Rogue
shortDescription: A variant rogue who prefers to put her skills to use in the great outdoors.
shortDescriptionHtml: A variant rogue who prefers to put her skills to use in the great outdoors.

name: Dungeon Delver
shortDescription:
In many ways, the dungeon delver is the ultimate adventuring rogue. He�s skilled at moving stealthily through all types of dungeon terrain, detecting and disarming inconvenient traps, bypassing locks, locating treasure, and ?lching protected items.

Since a dungeon delver frequently works alone, he must learn to think and act independently, relying upon no one but himself. Even when exploring a dungeon in the company of other adventurers, he often keeps to himself�scouting ahead, disarming traps a safe distance from the group, or seeking treasure while the others are distracted.

The typical dungeon delver has forsaken interaction skills to concentrate on the nuts and bolts of dungeon exploration and treasure retrieval. Rogues and scouts make excellent dungeon delvers, as do the rare few ninjas and spellthieves who choose to pursue this track. Multiclass rogue/rangers who favor the darkness of caverns to the light of the sky also make good dungeon delvers.

shortDescription: Shadowbane inquisitors battle incessantly against evil in whatever form it takes.

name: Vigilante
shortDescription: The vigilante combines magical and mundane investigative techniques to assess a crime scene.

name: Fatespinner
shortDescription: A fatespinner has pulled back the curtain of chance, circumstance, and chaos to glimpse a deeper truth: probability.
shortDescriptionHtml: A fatespinner has pulled back the curtain of chance, circumstance, and chaos to glimpse a deeper truth: probability.

name: Geometer
shortDescription: The geometer is the master of written magic and spells inscribed within a perfectly rendered diagram.
shortDescriptionHtml: The geometer is the master of written magic and spells inscribed within a perfectly rendered diagram.

name: Shadowstriker
shortDescription: The elite group known as the shadowstrikers is the military arm of Pelor's Shadow Guard.
shortDescriptionHtml: The elite group known as the shadowstrikers is the military arm of Pelor's Shadow Guard.

name: Entropomancer
shortDescription: Entropomancers gain attunement to the great nothingness they say lies at the center of the universe.
shortDescriptionHtml: Entropomancers gain attunement to the great nothingness they say lies at the center of the universe.

shortDescription: The consecrated harrier acts as a bounty hunter for her religion or organization.
shortDescriptionHtml: The consecrated harrier acts as a bounty hunter for her religion or organization.

shortDescription: The lyric thaumaturge has learned to make her magic and her music resonate into harmonic chords that enhance the effects of both.
shortDescriptionHtml: The lyric thaumaturge has learned to make her magic and her music resonate into harmonic chords that enhance the effects of both.

name: Cloaked Dancer
shortDescription: The cloaked dancer dances into the hearts and minds of her audience, beguiling those around her with boundless charm and careful dance moves, leaving her victims in a state of ecstasy even as she kills them.
shortDescriptionHtml: The cloaked dancer dances into the hearts and minds of her audience, beguiling those around her with boundless charm and careful dance moves, leaving her victims in a state of ecstasy even as she kills them.

shortDescriptionHtml: Gray Hand enforcers are highly trained members of the Gray Hands, Waterdeep's elite, high-powered fighting force.

name: Ravager

shortDescriptionHtml: The infamous ravager has dedicated himself to the service of Erythnul, deity of slaughter.

name: Ronin
shortDescription: A ronin is a masterless warrior cast adrift in the world, but still clinging to the remnants of his former life.
shortDescriptionHtml: A ronin is a masterless warrior cast adrift in the world, but still clinging to the remnants of his former life.

shortDescription: The duelist is a nimble, intelligent fighter trained in making precise attacks with light weapons.
shortDescriptionHtml: The duelist is a nimble, intelligent fighter trained in making precise attacks with light weapons.

shortDescription: The Red Wizards are the masters of Thay, the would-be magical overlords of the land of Faer�n.
shortDescriptionHtml: The Red Wizards are the masters of Thay, the would-be magical overlords of the land of Faer�n.

name: Dispassionate Watcher of Chronepsis
shortDescription: Taking the role of observers rather than active participants, dispassionate watchers of Chronepsis remain aloof from the events of the world.
shortDescriptionHtml: Taking the role of observers rather than active participants, dispassionate watchers of Chronepsis remain aloof from the events of the world.

name: Dragonkith
shortDescription: Dragonkith are creatures that serve and aid dragons.
shortDescriptionHtml: Dragonkith are creatures that serve and aid dragons.

name: Demonbinder
shortDescription: The demonbinder draws the essence of demons into herself to acquire their power.
shortDescriptionHtml: The demonbinder draws the essence of demons into herself to acquire their power.

name: Cosmic Descryer
shortDescription: The cosmic descryer is interested in the infinite variety of the planes and fascinated by the different layers of the multiverse.
shortDescriptionHtml: The cosmic descryer is interested in the infinite variety of the planes and fascinated by the different layers of the multiverse.

name: Epic Shadowdancer
shortDescription: While the epic assassin udes the shadows, the epic shadowdancer becomes the shadows, indistinguishable from the darkness cloaking her.
shortDescriptionHtml: While the epic assassin udes the shadows, the epic shadowdancer becomes the shadows, indistinguishable from the darkness cloaking her.

name: Perfect Wight
shortDescription: The perfect wight is a master of skulking, the ultimate prowler and thief.
shortDescriptionHtml: The perfect wight is a master of skulking, the ultimate prowler and thief.

name: Hellreaver
shortDescription: Hellreavers are warriors whose outrage at the actions of the fiends and their ability to corrupt and seduce without consequences fuels and array of combat abilities.
shortDescriptionHtml: Hellreavers are warriors whose outrage at the actions of the fiends and their ability to corrupt and seduce without consequences fuels and array of combat abilities.

name: Forest Master
shortDescription: Guardians of the pristine wilderness and defenders of the ancient trees, forest masters are the living embodiments of sentient nature.
shortDescriptionHtml: Guardians of the pristine wilderness and defenders of the ancient trees, forest masters are the living embodiments of sentient nature.

name: Heartwarder
shortDescription: Heartwarders are aesthetes and hedonists who actively seek out pleasure and beauty in all things and who nurture the creation of beautiful objects.
shortDescriptionHtml: Heartwarders are aesthetes and hedonists who actively seek out pleasure and beauty in all things and who nurture the creation of beautiful objects.

name: Disciple of Thrym
shortDescription: Aside from predictions of Ragnarok, disciples of Thrym spend a large portion of their time undermining those who serve Thor and Loki, the deities who conspired against Thrym.
shortDescriptionHtml: Aside from predictions of Ragnarok, disciples of Thrym spend a large portion of their time undermining those who serve Thor and Loki, the deities who conspired against Thrym.

name: Ranger Variant
shortDescription: A variant ranger class.
shortDescriptionHtml: A variant ranger class.

name: Warrior
shortDescription: This NPC class contains people such as soldiers, guards, and militia.
shortDescriptionHtml: This NPC class contains people such as soldiers, guards, and militia.

name: Paladin of Freedom
shortDescription: A variant paladin who is dedicated to liberty and free thought.
shortDescriptionHtml: A variant paladin who is dedicated to liberty and free thought.

name: Prophet of Erathaoi
shortDescription: The prophet of Erathaoi is a seer and visionary, a medium of the heavenly will, pronouncing judgment on corruption and evil in the world.
shortDescriptionHtml: The prophet of Erathaoi is a seer and visionary, a medium of the heavenly will, pronouncing judgment on corruption and evil in the world.

name: Stalker of Kharash
shortDescription: The stalkers of Kharash are a loose-knit order of rangers, rogues, and other characters devoted to fighting evil under Kharash's patronage.
shortDescriptionHtml: The stalkers of Kharash are a loose-knit order of rangers, rogues, and other characters devoted to fighting evil under Kharash's patronage.

name: Vassal of Bahamut
shortDescription: A vassal of Bahamut is a devout, nondraconic champion in the service of the Dragon King.
shortDescriptionHtml: A vassal of Bahamut is a devout, nondraconic champion in the service of the Dragon King.

name: Thrall of Juiblex
shortDescription: A thrall of Juiblex oozes a horrible slime and is surrounded by a nauseating stench.
shortDescriptionHtml: A thrall of Juiblex oozes a horrible slime and is surrounded by a nauseating stench.

name: Ur-priest
shortDescription: A small number of ur-priests have learned to tap into divine power and use it without praying to or worshiping a god.
shortDescriptionHtml: A small number of ur-priests have learned to tap into divine power and use it without praying to or worshiping a god.

name: Ghost-faced Killer
shortDescription:
Long ago, a persecuted clan of dangerous warriors sought a way to take revenge against their oppressors. Through sorcery, the spellcasters of the clan beseeched dark spirits to reveal a way that their clan might survive the coming strife and take revenge on the emperor who sought to crush them. The clan members struck a dark bargain, and the demon-spirits they had contacted provided the clan with a means to the bloody ends they desired. Donning terrifying masks to hide their identities, warriors of the clan crept into the imperial palace, and through the evil power of the pact they had made, passed invisibly and intangibly into the imperial household and  murdered the entire imperial family, plunging the country into bloody civil war once again. No one ever discovered the clan�s honorless actions, and to this day, no one knows what clan the ghost-faced killers came from. 

Today ghost-faced killers act as assassins and spies for hire, a mercenary clan that hides behind a guise of open and honorable conduct. When on a mission, they wear porcelain demon-masks of ghostly white to hide their identities and as a symbol of the pact their clan made with the demon-spirits. Through training and discipline, ghost-faced killers learn the deadliest and most terrifying ways to attack foes, and through their mystic connection with spirits, ghost-faced killers learn to turn invisible, walk through walls, and even see with the eyes of the spirits themselves.

Most ghost-faced killers begin their careers as rangers or rogues, though ninjas are also common. Fighters are only slightly less common. Few monks, barbarians, or members of spellcasting classes choose to become ghost-faced killers, but such characters are not unknown.

name: Initiate of the Sevenfold Veil
shortDescription: A master of defensive magic, the Initiate of the Sevenfold Veil approaches the prismatic barrier by mastering one by one its constituent veils or layers.
shortDescriptionHtml: A master of defensive magic, the Initiate of the Sevenfold Veil approaches the prismatic barrier by mastering one by one its constituent veils or layers.

name: Ordained Champion
shortDescription: Steeped in a tradition older than most religions, the ordained champions stride through the chaotic fog of violence and bloodshed.
shortDescriptionHtml: Steeped in a tradition older than most religions, the ordained champions stride through the chaotic fog of violence and bloodshed.

name: Sacred Fist
shortDescription: Sacred fists are independent organizations found within many temples.
shortDescriptionHtml: Sacred fists are independent organizations found within many temples.

name: Eldritch Theurge
shortDescription: Most of those who find themselves blessed (or cursed) with magic burning in their fiendish blood become warlocks, but a rare few study formal magic to better understand and control their powers. The result is the eldritch theurge, a master of both spells and invocations, a mage with the terrifying combination of potent spells and a reserve of abilities he can't possibly exhaust.
shortDescriptionHtml: Most of those who find themselves blessed (or cursed) with magic burning in their fiendish blood become warlocks, but a rare few study formal magic to better understand and control their powers. The result is the eldritch theurge, a master of both spells and invocations, a mage with the terrifying combination of potent spells and a reserve of abilities he can't possibly exhaust.

name: Enlightened Spirit
shortDescription: Some warlocks start down the fiendish path, then repent and turn toward the light. Such rare individuals are called enlightened spirits.
shortDescriptionHtml: Some warlocks start down the fiendish path, then repent and turn toward the light. Such rare individuals are called enlightened spirits.

name: Holy Scourge
shortDescription: The holy scourge is a multitalented soldier in the endless war against evil, an arcane caster who instills within his magic the power to cleanse the world of wickedness and depravity. Although he lacks actual divine spellcasting power, he makes up for this shortfall by infusing his evocations with holy power and developing abilities that help him smite evil wherever it appears.

Although he lacks actual divine spellcasting power, he makes up for this shortfall by infusing his evocations with holy power and developing abilities that help him smite evil wherever it appears.

name: Anarchic Initiate
shortDescription:
The wilder class provides characters both the proper frame of mind and the wild surge class feature, and thus is the most standard beginning for anarchic initiates. The prestige class also draws those who, through natural talent or a desire to live on the edge, have learned to channel psionic power to great effect at a cost to their own bodies.

Since anarchic initiates are still concerned with manifesting powers, very few initiates multiclass (aside from the levels they take in their original class), because few desire to lose any levels of manifesting ability.

name: Fortune's Friend
shortDescription: The fortune's friend lives by his luck.
shortDescriptionHtml: The fortune's friend lives by his luck.

name: Bladesinger
shortDescription: Bladesingers are elves who have blended art, swordplay, and arcane magic into a harmonious whole.
shortDescriptionHtml: Bladesingers are elves who have blended art, swordplay, and arcane magic into a harmonious whole.

name: Bear Warrior
shortDescription: Bear warriors, through a special relationship with bear spirits, literally adopt a bear's strength in the rage of battle, actually transforming into bears while they fight.
shortDescriptionHtml: Bear warriors, through a special relationship with bear spirits, literally adopt a bear's strength in the rage of battle, actually transforming into bears while they fight.

name: Dragon Rider
shortDescription: Dragon riders develop a strong bond with their mounts that allows the two to work together.
shortDescriptionHtml: Dragon riders develop a strong bond with their mounts that allows the two to work together.

name: Knight of the Sword
shortDescription: Knights of the Sword are warriors of the Solamnic Knights who fight with power and faith to defend justice and truth.
shortDescriptionHtml: Knights of the Sword are warriors of the Solamnic Knights who fight with power and faith to defend justice and truth.

name: Soldier of Light
shortDescription: The Soldiers of Light are a military order dedicated to open warfare against the minions of their church's enemies.
shortDescriptionHtml: The Soldiers of Light are a military order dedicated to open warfare against the minions of their church's enemies.

name: Blackguard
shortDescription: The blackguard is the quintessential black knight.
shortDescriptionHtml: The blackguard is the quintessential black knight.

name: Dragonslayer
shortDescription: Dragonslayers combat dragons.
shortDescriptionHtml: Dragonslayers combat dragons.

name: Elemental Master
shortDescription: Elemental masters strive to attain the purity of perfect attunement with both the energy of their breath weapons and the elemental nature of their core.
shortDescriptionHtml: Elemental masters strive to attain the purity of perfect attunement with both the energy of their breath weapons and the elemental nature of their core.

name: Hidecarved Dragon
shortDescription: Hidecarved dragons are members of an enigmatic order of dragons and half-dragons.
shortDescriptionHtml: Hidecarved dragons are members of an enigmatic order of dragons and half-dragons.

name: Platinum Knight
shortDescription: The platinum knight protects good-aligned dragonkind from their natural enemies.
shortDescriptionHtml: The platinum knight protects good-aligned dragonkind from their natural enemies.

name: Soulguard
shortDescription: Soulguards openly oppose fiendish practices and go to great lengths to protect those beset by the power of Baator.
shortDescriptionHtml: Soulguards openly oppose fiendish practices and go to great lengths to protect those beset by the power of Baator.

name: Auspician
shortDescription: Auspicians, who manipulate luck as if it were the strings of a worn mandolin, give credence to their claims.
shortDescriptionHtml: Auspicians, who manipulate luck as if it were the strings of a worn mandolin, give credence to their claims.

name: Cloud Anchorite
shortDescription: The cloud anchorite seeks a way to achieve immortality while maintaining life and awareness.
shortDescriptionHtml: The cloud anchorite seeks a way to achieve immortality while maintaining life and awareness.

name: Rimefire Witch
shortDescription: A rimefire witch is one who has followed a mysterious call to the core of a rimefire iceberg and becomes infused with great power by the rimefire eidolon.
shortDescriptionHtml: A rimefire witch is one who has followed a mysterious call to the core of a rimefire iceberg and becomes infused with great power by the rimefire eidolon.

name: Ninja
shortDescription:
Ninjas move through the shadows, striking down the unwary and vanishing again with ease. Ninjas walk where others cannot. They blend their training in stealth and assassination with a focused mind. Their rigorous preparation sharpens their minds and bodies, giving them supernatural abilities of stealth and  making them phantoms in the eyes of many. Although ninjas in battle lack the staying power of martial  characters such as fighters or barbarians, they excel at making combat occur on their terms�appearing and disappearing seemingly at a whim. 

Historically, ninjas came from clans of assassins  and guerrilla warriors in feudal Japan. In a fantasy setting, they blend a gift for stealth and infiltration with devastating surprise attacks and supernatural means of avoiding blows. Although the specific abilities of the class differ from those attributed to the  historical ninja, they mirror the ninja�s fearsome reputation as a spy, assassin, and martial artist.

name: Swashbuckler
shortDescription: The swashbuckler embodies the concepts of daring and panache.
shortDescriptionHtml: The swashbuckler embodies the concepts of daring and panache.

name: Dragonfire Adept
shortDescription: Whether they are bold champions defending the weak and downtrodden, or merciless raiders seeking might and riches, dragonfire adepts are imposing figures who command the magic of dragonkind.
shortDescriptionHtml: Whether they are bold champions defending the weak and downtrodden, or merciless raiders seeking might and riches, dragonfire adepts are imposing figures who command the magic of dragonkind.

name: Epic Psion
shortDescription: An epic seeker after psionic secrets; a master of the mind and the thoughts of others.
shortDescriptionHtml: An epic seeker after psionic secrets; a master of the mind and the thoughts of others.

name: Shaman
shortDescription: Shamans are intermediaries between the mortal world and the realm of spirits.
shortDescriptionHtml: Shamans are intermediaries between the mortal world and the realm of spirits.

name: Warblade
shortDescription: The warblade was born for conflict. Swift, strong, enduring, and utterly confident in his martial skills, he seeks to test himself against worthy foes.
shortDescriptionHtml: The warblade was born for conflict. Swift, strong, enduring, and utterly confident in his martial skills, he seeks to test himself against worthy foes.

name: Specialized Wizard Variants
shortDescription: Each variant specialized class gives up one of the standard specialist's class abilities in exchange for a new ability unique to the variant specialist.
shortDescriptionHtml: Each variant specialized class gives up one of the standard specialist's class abilities in exchange for a new ability unique to the variant specialist.

name: Lion of Talisid
shortDescription: The lions of Talisid protect nature and emulate their patron in more concrete ways.
shortDescriptionHtml: The lions of Talisid protect nature and emulate their patron in more concrete ways.

name: Sentinel of Bharrai
shortDescription: Respect for the power of nature, the desire to further the ends of good, and the resolve to destroy evil are the core beliefs of a sentinel of Bharrai.
shortDescriptionHtml: Respect for the power of nature, the desire to further the ends of good, and the resolve to destroy evil are the core beliefs of a sentinel of Bharrai.

name: Beloved of Valarian
shortDescription:
The beloved of Valarian (also called Valarian�s beloved) are women who have foresworn the love of mortals to dedicate themselves entirely to the unicorn deity Valarian, thus fostering a close bond with unicorns. They normally come from the ranks of exalted rangers or druids, although there have been paladins and even fighters who have chosen this path. Most of Valarian�s beloved are humans, elves, and half-elves, but halflings, gnomes, and dwarves are not prohibited.

A beloved of Valarian is a solitary being, shunning civilization. She retreats to the woods where she maintains few contacts with the outside world. Because she champions the cause of good, she calls upon their animal allies to help repel invaders should evil invade her forest refuge. Her relationship with the unicorn is nothing less than a partnership forged in light. She has a closer emotional bond to her mount than she does with her own family members. Just as she relies on the unicorn, the unicorn relies on her to help keep its mysteries safe.

All of Valarian�s beloved must be chaste and must dedicate herself wholly both to good and her unicorn companion. Should a beloved of Valarian ever willingly couple with a mortal, the unicorn leaves her company without hard feelings or regret. Because of the solitary existence these women must endure, it is rare (but not unheard of ) for Valarian�s beloved to join ranks with others. They prefer the companionship of paladins but associate with any good characters during times of trouble. Under no circumstances will one of Valarian�s beloved agree to join with an evil character, and she barely tolerates neutral characters. The beloved of Valarian and their unicorn companions may leave their forest sanctuaries should they be needed to fight evil.

name: Radiant Servant of Pelor
shortDescription: The radiant servants of Pelor put the dogma of demonstrating strength through charity and modesty into living practice.

name: Wild Soul
shortDescription: As druids are divine casters who share a link with the animals of nature, wild souls develop a similar link to the world's fey. And like the fey themselves, wild souls swear allegiance - or at least an alliance - with one of the two great courts.
shortDescriptionHtml: As druids are divine casters who share a link with the animals of nature, wild souls develop a similar link to the world's fey. And like the fey themselves, wild souls swear allegiance – or at least an alliance – with one of the two great courts.

name: Avenging Executioner
shortDescription: Relentless and inventive, these stalkers wield psychology as deftly as their weapons.
shortDescriptionHtml: Relentless and inventive, these stalkers wield psychology as deftly as their weapons.

name: Hunter of the Dead
shortDescription: The hunter of the dead spends each restless night tracking undead to their lairs and cleansing the land of their foul presence.

name: Kensai
shortDescription: The kensai masters body, mind, weapon, and will.

shortDescription: Masters of the unseen hand delight in crushing their foes with invisible force, flinging massive objects into the sky, and disarming enemies with a single thought.

shortDescription: Reaping maulers are the back-breakers, the limb-twisters, and the neck-snappers among pit fighters.

name: Spellsword
shortDescription: The dream of melding magic and weaponplay is fulfilled in the person of the spellsword.

name: Legendary Tactician
shortDescription: Legendary tacticians are respected (or feared) for their ability to inspire their troops.
shortDescriptionHtml: Legendary tacticians are respected (or feared) for their ability to inspire their troops.

name: Dragon Descendant
shortDescription: A secret monastic order, dragon descendants tap into the power of their draconic heritage to call on their ancestors in times of need.
shortDescriptionHtml: A secret monastic order, dragon descendants tap into the power of their draconic heritage to call on their ancestors in times of need.

name: Arcane Archer
shortDescription: The arcane archer is a warrior skilled in using magic to supplement her combat prowess.
shortDescriptionHtml: The arcane archer is a warrior skilled in using magic to supplement her combat prowess.

name: Horizon Walker
shortDescription: The horizon walker is an unceasing traveler to the universe's most dangerous places.
shortDescriptionHtml: The horizon walker is an unceasing traveler to the universe's most dangerous places.

name: Silver Key
shortDescription: A silver key is a master of stealth and security, and an expert at getting into and out of tight places.
shortDescriptionHtml: A silver key is a master of stealth and security, and an expert at getting into and out of tight places.

name: Dweomerkeeper
shortDescription: Dweomerkeepers are Mystra's shepherds, safeguarding the Weave against threats to its integrity.
shortDescriptionHtml: Dweomerkeepers are Mystra's shepherds, safeguarding the Weave against threats to its integrity.

name: Divine Champion
shortDescription: Divine champions are mighty warriors who dedicate themselves to their deity's cause, defending holy ground, destroying enemies of the church, and slaying mythical beasts and clerics of opposing faiths.
shortDescriptionHtml: Divine champions are mighty warriors who dedicate themselves to their deity's cause, defending holy ground, destroying enemies of the church, and slaying mythical beasts and clerics of opposing faiths.

name: Divine Mind
shortDescription: A divine mind is a psionic character who channels the power of the divine through pisonic talent instead of faith.
shortDescriptionHtml: A divine mind is a psionic character who channels the power of the divine through pisonic talent instead of faith.

name: Paladin Variant
shortDescription: A variant paladin class.
shortDescriptionHtml: A variant paladin class.

name: Epic Paladin
shortDescription: An epic champion of justice and destroyer of evil, protected and strengthened by an array of divine powers.
shortDescriptionHtml: An epic champion of justice and destroyer of evil, protected and strengthened by an array of divine powers.

name: Epic Sorcerer
shortDescription: An epic spellcaster with inborn magical ability.
shortDescriptionHtml: An epic spellcaster with inborn magical ability.

name: Dragon Shaman
shortDescription: If you gaze at dragons with awe and aspire to share their power and majesty, then the dragon shaman is the class for you.
shortDescriptionHtml: If you gaze at dragons with awe and aspire to share their power and majesty, then the dragon shaman is the class for you.

name: Knight
shortDescription: The knight class is a great choice if you want to play a tough, durable melee combatant whose strong personality allows you to manipulate your foes.
shortDescriptionHtml: The knight class is a great choice if you want to play a tough, durable melee combatant whose strong personality allows you to manipulate your foes.

name: Paladin of Slaughter
shortDescription: A variant paladin who is a brutal champion of chaos and evil, and who leaves only destruction trailing in his wake.
shortDescriptionHtml: A variant paladin who is a brutal champion of chaos and evil, and who leaves only destruction trailing in his wake.

name: Psychic Warrior
shortDescription:
One who turns the mind�s potential to the warrior�s art is known as a psychic warrior. Where psions devote themselves wholly to the development of mind-engendered abilities, psychic warriors give emphasis to the development of the body. With mental and physical energy working in union, the psychic warrior strives toward martial perfection.

The sword, axe, and bow are physical tools that psychic warriors embrace along with their psionic abilities. Well trained in both physical and psionic matters, the psychic warrior is a formidable adversary.

The defining trait of the psychic warrior is his ability to supplement his physical attacks with psionic feats and powers. A combination of strength, martial skill, and psionic ability allows the psychic warrior to match and sometimes surpass a normal fighter of equal experience. As the psychic warrior gains experience and power, his ?ghting skills and psionic abilities grow in concert.

shortDescription: A disciple of Mephistopheles wields hellfire as his weapon.
shortDescriptionHtml: A disciple of Mephistopheles wields hellfire as his weapon.

name: Mortal Hunter
shortDescription: Mortal hunters are fiends who specialize in killing mortals.
shortDescriptionHtml: Mortal hunters are fiends who specialize in killing mortals.

name: Warrior of Darkness
shortDescription: The warrior of darkness, sometimes called the dark knight, is a practitioner of black magic.
shortDescriptionHtml: The warrior of darkness, sometimes called the dark knight, is a practitioner of black magic.

name: Cancer Mage
shortDescription: The cancer mage makes quick, poisonous attacks and then retreats.
shortDescriptionHtml: The cancer mage makes quick, poisonous attacks and then retreats.

name: Thief-acrobat
shortDescription: A thief-acrobat excels in getting in and getting out.
shortDescriptionHtml: A thief-acrobat excels in getting in and getting out.

name: Wild Plains Outrider
shortDescription: Wild plains outriders work tirelessly to keep the plains as safe as such remote places can be.
shortDescriptionHtml: Wild plains outriders work tirelessly to keep the plains as safe as such remote places can be.

name: Enlightened Fist
shortDescription: Enlightened fists master the use of touch spells, creating new forms of combat with their fists.
shortDescriptionHtml: Enlightened fists master the use of touch spells, creating new forms of combat with their fists.

name: Master Transmogrifist
shortDescription: The master transmogrifist is a sorcerer or wizard who has chosen to specialize in spells that change his form.
shortDescriptionHtml: The master transmogrifist is a sorcerer or wizard who has chosen to specialize in spells that change his form.

name: Blood Magus
shortDescription: Blood magi are deceased spellcasters who gain an understanding of blood's importance when returned to life.
shortDescriptionHtml: Blood magi are deceased spellcasters who gain an understanding of blood's importance when returned to life.

name: Fist of the Forest
shortDescription: For some among the Guardians of the Green, the pursuit of an animalistic lifestyle is a form of asceticism.
shortDescriptionHtml: For some among the Guardians of the Green, the pursuit of an animalistic lifestyle is a form of asceticism.

name: Pious Templar
shortDescription: Sworn to the defense of a temple site, the pious templar is a holy warrior blessed by her deity with combat prowess and great endurance.
shortDescriptionHtml: Sworn to the defense of a temple site, the pious templar is a holy warrior blessed by her deity with combat prowess and great endurance.

name: Black Flame Zealot
shortDescription: Trained in unholy rites, the black flame zealots use stealth, divine magic, and the zeal of fanaticism to destroy those who have given offense to their god.
shortDescriptionHtml: Trained in unholy rites, the black flame zealots use stealth, divine magic, and the zeal of fanaticism to destroy those who have given offense to their god.

name: Crimson Scourge
shortDescription: The crimson scourge is a tough and efficient tracker who specializes in dealing painful but ultimately nonlethal wounds.
shortDescriptionHtml: The crimson scourge is a tough and efficient tracker who specializes in dealing painful but ultimately nonlethal wounds.

name: Nightmare Spinner
shortDescription: The nightmare spinner can reach into the darkest recesses of the mind, draw forth his victim's  nightmares, and make them seem all too real.
shortDescriptionHtml: The nightmare spinner can reach into the darkest recesses of the mind, draw forth his victim's nightmares, and make them seem all too real.

name: Malconvoker
shortDescription: Daring summoners known as malconvokers bargain with their lives.
shortDescriptionHtml: Daring summoners known as malconvokers bargain with their lives.

name: Spellwarp Sniper
shortDescription: The spellwarp sniper contorts spells, changing area effects into rays that deliver precise, devastating attacks.
shortDescriptionHtml: The spellwarp sniper contorts spells, changing area effects into rays that deliver precise, devastating attacks.

name: Hulking Hurler
shortDescription: Hulking hurlers belong to those races of generously proportioned creatures who enjoy nothing more than wrenching boulders, trees, and even buildings free of their earthly bonds and throwing them at their foes.
shortDescriptionHtml: Hulking hurlers belong to those races of generously proportioned creatures who enjoy nothing more than wrenching boulders, trees, and even buildings free of their earthly bonds and throwing them at their foes.

name: Knight of the Chalice
shortDescription: The knight of the Chalice is a member of an elite knightly organization devoted to fighting demons and other evil outsiders.
shortDescriptionHtml: The knight of the Chalice is a member of an elite knightly organization devoted to fighting demons and other evil outsiders.

name: Master Thrower
shortDescription: Master throwers depend on quick reflexes, good planning, and deadly aim.
shortDescriptionHtml: Master throwers depend on quick reflexes, good planning, and deadly aim.

name: Rage Mage
shortDescription: The rage mage's approach to magic is based on the primal passion of magic more than the studious quasi-scientific approach.
shortDescriptionHtml: The rage mage's approach to magic is based on the primal passion of magic more than the studious quasi-scientific approach.

name: Dwarven Defender
shortDescription: The defender is a sponsored champion of a dwarven cause
shortDescriptionHtml: The defender is a sponsored champion of a dwarven cause

name: Arachnomancer
shortDescription: By discarding the religious traditions dominating drow culture, the arachnomancer finds a different way to serve the Weaver of Webs. Through careful study, the arachnomancer comes to understand spiders in a unique and disturbing way, developing a rapport with the vermin. It doesn't take long for the arachnomancer to shape his magical studies to awaken the Spider Queen's blessings within himself, allowing him to assume the form of a monstrous spider.

name: Insidious Corruptor
shortDescription: The insidious corruptor is a manipulator, a devious and sinister villain who lures individuals to their doom.
shortDescriptionHtml: The insidious corruptor is a manipulator, a devious and sinister villain who lures individuals to their doom.

name: Beast Heart Adept
shortDescription:
Adventurers face monsters every time they descend into a new dungeon. Most view the creatures as horrid abominations that want nothing more than to cut them down where they stand. However, the beast heart adept sees through a monster�s frightening visage. 

By attuning himself to the bestial urges of dungeon creatures, he learns to form powerful bonds with a small number of monsters. These creatures become his devoted allies, and together they form a potent fighting combination.

The role of a beast heart adept is not an easy one. A potential member of this class must throw himself into the rugged, dangerous world beneath the ground. There, he submerges his civilized urges and learns to live as a beast. He uses this experience, along with his knowledge of magic, animal husbandry, and subterranean ecology, to unleash the monstrous creature that hides within his heart. Once he completes this process, he becomes capable of forming a powerful bond with certain creatures.
shortDescriptionHtml:
Adventurers face monsters every time they descend into a new dungeon. Most view the creatures as horrid abominations that want nothing more than to cut them down where they stand. However, the beast heart adept sees through a monster�s frightening visage.

By attuning himself to the bestial urges of dungeon creatures, he learns to form powerful bonds with a small number of monsters. These creatures become his devoted allies, and together they form a potent fighting combination.

name: Knight Phantom
shortDescription: The knight phantom prestige class takes capable wizards and gradually turns them into capable melee fighters, without slowing their spellcasting too much.
shortDescriptionHtml: The knight phantom prestige class takes capable wizards and gradually turns them into capable melee fighters, without slowing their spellcasting too much.

name: Dreadmaster
shortDescription: Dreadmasters seek to rule absolutely, preferably through terror and domination.
shortDescriptionHtml: Dreadmasters seek to rule absolutely, preferably through terror and domination.

name: Frost Mage
shortDescription: Frost mages usually hail from lands of cold, snow, and ice: tundra, glaciers even outer planes perpetually shrouded in winter.
shortDescriptionHtml: Frost mages usually hail from lands of cold, snow, and ice: tundra, glaciers even outer planes perpetually shrouded in winter.

name: Scout
shortDescription: A scout has some training in weapons and a unique combat style that favors fast movement and devastating attacks.
shortDescriptionHtml: A scout has some training in weapons and a unique combat style that favors fast movement and devastating attacks.

name: Githzerai Racial Class
shortDescription: The githzerai are attuned to the mysteries of the inner self and are considered a race of ascetics who harness the power of the mind and the spirit.
shortDescriptionHtml: The githzerai are attuned to the mysteries of the inner self and are considered a race of ascetics who harness the power of the mind and the spirit.

name: Hexblade
shortDescription: Combining the dynamic powers of martial prowess and arcane might, the hexblade presents a deadly challenge to opponents unused to such a foe.
shortDescriptionHtml: Combining the dynamic powers of martial prowess and arcane might, the hexblade presents a deadly challenge to opponents unused to such a foe.

name: Epic Rogue
shortDescription: An epic tricky, skillful scout and spy who wins the battle by stealth rather than brute force.
shortDescriptionHtml: An epic tricky, skillful scout and spy who wins the battle by stealth rather than brute force.

name: Exalted Arcanist
shortDescription:
Tales say that sorcerers gain their innate magical ability from draconic blood, and many sorcerers (especially kobold sorcerers) loudly champion this legend. Aasimar sorcerers, meanwhile, smile to themselves, knowing that dragons are not the only source of spontaneous arcane power. Among both sorcerers and bards, some trace the source of their power back to celestial influence, either bloodline or simply favor. These are the exalted arcanists, spontaneous spellcasters who gain access to spells that channel celestial energy.

Only characters who spontaneously cast arcane spells can become exalted arcanists, which means that in most campaigns the class is limited to sorcerers and bards.

name: Highland Stalker
shortDescription:
The mountains are unforgiving, and the ability to ?nd food at high altitude often means the difference between survival and starvation. For those who live in such climes, hunters provide not only food but also clothing, shelter, and tools when they bring back animal skins and bones. The best high-altitude hunters�highland stalkers�are consummate trackers with an instinctive knowledge of their mountainous territories.

Scouts (see page 10) are the most likely candidates to become highland stalkers, but rogues are well represented, and the prestige class attracts a fair number of multiclass barbarians and rangers who qualify.

name: Nightsong Enforcer
shortDescription:
The enforcers of the Nightsong Guild (see page 177) focus on the stealth-centered combat training that rogues usually learn; they forgo some of the sleight of hand or fast-talking aspects of being a thief. However, nightsong enforcers are not mere thugs. They are deadly opponents who strike from hidden positions and move silently behind their foes. When in battle, their goal is to eliminate their enemies, not to ?ght. Thus, they strike quickly from the shadows. They do not worry about honor or ?ghting fair, scof?ng at such ideals as childish.

Rogues most often become nightsong enforcers,  although bards, ?ghters, and urban rangers are also known to undertake the class. On occasion a wizard or sorcerer will endure the intensive training required to join the enforcers� ranks.

When working with others, a nightsong enforcer is the linchpin. She is the very picture of ?delity when it comes to supporting teammates on a mission. It is common for an enforcer to lead a team composed of not only other enforcers, but ?ghters, spellcasters, or rogues.

name: Alienist
shortDescription:
Alienists deal with powers and entities from terrifyingly remote reaches of space and time. For them, magical power is the triumph of the mind over the rude boundaries of dimension, distance, and often, sanity. With knowledge and determination, they pierce the barrier at the edge of time itself. In the Far Realm, outside time, Herculean minds drift, absorbed in contemplations of madness. Unspeakable beings whisper terrifying secrets to those who dare communication. These secrets were not meant for mortals, but the alienist plunges into abysses of chaos and entropy that would blast a weaker mind. An alienist's mad certainty is sometimes strong enough to sway others to believe in her own future transcendence. 

Alienists might, on rare occasions, gather in secluded groups to enact some obscure ritual, but more often they are encountered singly. NPC alienists sometimes haunt libraries or specialty bookshops in large cities, skulking and mumbling among stacks of rare (and dangerous) volumes.

name: Argent Savant
shortDescription: The argent savant regards spells that evoke or apply magical force as the noblest and most fascinating spells at her disposal.
shortDescriptionHtml: The argent savant regards spells that evoke or apply magical force as the noblest and most fascinating spells at her disposal.

name: Shadowspy
shortDescription: Shadowspies are the covert arm of Pelor's Shadow Guard.
shortDescriptionHtml: Shadowspies are the covert arm of Pelor's Shadow Guard.

name: Squire of Legend
shortDescription: Not everyone who reveres the Six from Shadow desires to shape her entire life around her chosen paragon.
shortDescriptionHtml: Not everyone who reveres the Six from Shadow desires to shape her entire life around her chosen paragon.

name: Seeker of the Misty Isle
shortDescription: Seekers search for the lost elves of Misty Isle.
shortDescriptionHtml: Seekers search for the lost elves of Misty Isle.

name: Ebon Saint
shortDescription:
The ebon saint lives in the darkness, but seeks to expose his enemies to the light. Flitting from the shadows to learn the secrets of his enemies and dispatch them quickly, the ebon saint seeks to further his personal agenda by gathering and exploiting information on those who oppose him.

The goal of these dark infiltrators is to sneak into the lairs of their enemies, uncover their dark secrets, and expose them to the world. Whether an ebon saint seeks to right the wrongs of the world, maintain the status quo, or strike tyrannical fear into the hearts of the oppressed, he does so from the cold, unchanging certainty of the darkness in which he resides.

Ebon saints nearly all begin their careers as lurks, since that class provides the necessary foundation for ebon saint abilities. A fair number, however, are rogues with the Wild Talent feat. Whereas a lurk might use the shadows to achieve his ends, an ebon saint lives in them, seeking to master the art and discipline of the dire strike in the service of an ideology that is greater than any one person. The nature of that ideology is determined by each ebon saint, and is molded by his alignment and life experiences.
