name: Justice of Weald and Woe
shortDescription: The justice of weald and woe is the go-to person when something unsavory -- usually involving the removal of humans -- needs doing.
shortDescriptionHtml: The justice of weald and woe is the go-to person when something unsavory — usually involving the removal of humans — needs doing.

name: Darkwood Stalker
shortDescription: Some elves train as elite hunters of orcs; these hunters are called darkwood stalkers.
shortDescriptionHtml: Some elves train as elite hunters of orcs; these hunters are called darkwood stalkers.

name: Dervish
shortDescription: The dervish epitomizes speeds, quickness, and abandon.
shortDescriptionHtml: The dervish epitomizes speeds, quickness, and abandon.

name: Frenzied Berserker
shortDescription: The frenzied berserker is constantly seeking out more conflict to feed her craving for battle.
shortDescriptionHtml: The frenzied berserker is constantly seeking out more conflict to feed her craving for battle.

name: Inquisitor
shortDescription: By definition, an inquisitor is one who inquires, someone who hunts for people, information, or answers.
shortDescriptionHtml: By definition, an inquisitor is one who inquires, someone who hunts for people, information, or answers.

name: Arcane Trickster
shortDescription: Arcane tricksters combine their knowledge of spells with a taste for intrigue, larceny, or just plain mischief.
shortDescriptionHtml: Arcane tricksters combine their knowledge of spells with a taste for intrigue, larceny, or just plain mischief.

name: Archmage
shortDescription: The most advanced practitioners of arcane magic are frequently archmages.
shortDescriptionHtml: The most advanced practitioners of arcane magic are frequently archmages.

name: Eldritch Knight
shortDescription: Studying the martial and arcane arts to equal degree, the eldritch knight is a versatile combatant.
shortDescriptionHtml: Studying the martial and arcane arts to equal degree, the eldritch knight is a versatile combatant.

name: Hierophant
shortDescription: A divine spellcaster who rises high in the service of his deity gains access to spells and abilities of which lesser faithful can only dream.
shortDescriptionHtml: A divine spellcaster who rises high in the service of his deity gains access to spells and abilities of which lesser faithful can only dream.

name: Thaumaturgist
shortDescription: The thaumaturgist reaches out with divine power to other planes of existence, calling creatures there to do his bidding.
shortDescriptionHtml: The thaumaturgist reaches out with divine power to other planes of existence, calling creatures there to do his bidding.

name: Dread Fang of Lolth
shortDescription: The dread fangs of Lolth are elite soldiers who fight for the drow matriarchs.
shortDescriptionHtml: The dread fangs of Lolth are elite soldiers who fight for the drow matriarchs.

name: Dragonmark Heir
shortDescription: Dragonmark heirs have the ability to improve the dragonmarks they have manifested, as well as to develop additional abilities related to their dragonmarks.
shortDescriptionHtml: Dragonmark heirs have the ability to improve the dragonmarks they have manifested, as well as to develop additional abilities related to their dragonmarks.

name: Exorcist of the Silver Flame
shortDescription: Exorcists of the Silver Flame lead the Church of the Silver Flame's efforts in combating extraplanar threats.
shortDescriptionHtml: Exorcists of the Silver Flame lead the Church of the Silver Flame's efforts in combating extraplanar threats.

name: Epic Infiltrator
shortDescription: The epic infiltrator is an agent of espionage, an undercover operative, and sometimes a saboteur.
shortDescriptionHtml: The epic infiltrator is an agent of espionage, an undercover operative, and sometimes a saboteur.

name: Stormsinger
shortDescription: The stormsingers have learned the secret methods of harnessing the magic powers of music to influence and control the weather.
shortDescriptionHtml: The stormsingers have learned the secret methods of harnessing the magic powers of music to influence and control the weather.

name: Tomb Warden
shortDescription: Tomb wardens serve as selfless, undying protectors of the dead.
shortDescriptionHtml: Tomb wardens serve as selfless, undying protectors of the dead.

name: Beholder Mage
shortDescription: Through ritual destruction of its central eye, a beholder can learn to channel and use magic much more quickly and efficiently than can almost any other race.
shortDescriptionHtml: Through ritual destruction of its central eye, a beholder can learn to channel and use magic much more quickly and efficiently than can almost any other race.

name: Spellfire Channeler
shortDescription: Those who practice their spellfire can hone their talent into a tool with fantastic abilities that most dabblers can only dream of.
shortDescriptionHtml: Those who practice their spellfire can hone their talent into a tool with fantastic abilities that most dabblers can only dream of.

name: Daidoji Bodyguard
shortDescription: The Daidoji concentrate on defensive maneuvers and a style of fighting that induces their opponents to defeat themselves.
shortDescriptionHtml: The Daidoji concentrate on defensive maneuvers and a style of fighting that induces their opponents to defeat themselves.

name: Iaijutsu Master
shortDescription: Iaijutsu is the martial art of drawing a weapon (almost always a katana) and attacking with it in the same fluid motion. It is the foundation of some forms of dueling, and its masters are feared and respected throughout lands where iaijutsu is practiced. Iaijutsu masters harness their _ki_ energy to strike with blinding speed and devastating power.
shortDescriptionHtml: Iaijutsu is the martial art of drawing a weapon (almost always a katana) and attacking with it in the same fluid motion. It is the foundation of some forms of dueling, and its masters are feared and respected throughout lands where iaijutsu is practiced. Iaijutsu masters harness their ki energy to strike with blinding speed and devastating power.

name: Witch Hunter
shortDescription: Witch hunters combine magical training with combat expertise to battle the spiritual forces of evil in the world. Ghosts and other evil spirits, demons and oni, and practitioners of black magic are the witch hunters' sworn enemies, and they bring unique abilities and expertise to bear in combating these foes.
shortDescriptionHtml: Witch hunters combine magical training with combat expertise to battle the spiritual forces of evil in the world. Ghosts and other evil spirits, demons and oni, and practitioners of black magic are the witch hunters' sworn enemies, and they bring unique abilities and expertise to bear in combating these foes.

name: Black Blood Hunter
shortDescription: Malar grants exceptional power to those who supplement their bestial level of evil with truly vile acts.
shortDescriptionHtml: Malar grants exceptional power to those who supplement their bestial level of evil with truly vile acts.

name: Harper Agent
shortDescription: Harper agents are the "field agents" of the Harper organization, acting directly to gather intelligence and eliminate threats to the greater good.
shortDescriptionHtml: Harper agents are the "field agents" of the Harper organization, acting directly to gather intelligence and eliminate threats to the greater good.

name: Elven High Mage
shortDescription: Elven high mages are the masters of creating their own epic spells -- mythals that can grow to engulf entire cities.
shortDescriptionHtml: Elven high mages are the masters of creating their own epic spells — mythals that can grow to engulf entire cities.

name: Atavist
shortDescription: The discipline of an atavist strengthens his bond to the ancestral spirit and to all other kalashtar that have embraced their unique heritage.
shortDescriptionHtml: The discipline of an atavist strengthens his bond to the ancestral spirit and to all other kalashtar that have embraced their unique heritage.

name: Dawncaller
shortDescription: Dawncallers are goliath bards responsible for guarding their tribe throughout the night.
shortDescriptionHtml: Dawncallers are goliath bards responsible for guarding their tribe throughout the night.

name: Stoneblessed
shortDescription: A stoneblessed bonds to the stone of the mountains, blending into a dwarf, gnome, or goliath community and making it her home.
shortDescriptionHtml: A stoneblessed bonds to the stone of the mountains, blending into a dwarf, gnome, or goliath community and making it her home.

name: Lord of Tides
shortDescription: A lord of tides can sense the movement of magma, summon beings of elemental might, and open portals to the Elemental Planes.
shortDescriptionHtml: A lord of tides can sense the movement of magma, summon beings of elemental might, and open portals to the Elemental Planes.

name: Scorpion Heritor
shortDescription: Scorpion heritors, through a special relationship with the scorpion spirit, gain the mystical abilities of the scorpion, and can even take its shape.
shortDescriptionHtml: Scorpion heritors, through a special relationship with the scorpion spirit, gain the mystical abilities of the scorpion, and can even take its shape.

name: Weapon Master
shortDescription: For weapon masters, the perfection of kiis found in the mastery of a single melee weapon.
shortDescriptionHtml: For weapon masters, the perfection of kiis found in the mastery of a single melee weapon.

name: Hin Fist
shortDescription: Adapt the sacred fist prestige class from Complete Divineto create a hin fist.
shortDescriptionHtml: Adapt the sacred fist prestige class from Complete Divineto create a hin fist.

name: Haztaratain
shortDescription: The ascetic nature of the Haztaratain order appeals to those who focus on self-mastery; its martial spirit draws those who concentrate on might rather than mysticism.
shortDescriptionHtml: The ascetic nature of the Haztaratain order appeals to those who focus on self-mastery; its martial spirit draws those who concentrate on might rather than mysticism.

name: Waverider
shortDescription: The waverider and her companion animal defend their city with a vigor that exceeds either's individual powers.
shortDescriptionHtml: The waverider and her companion animal defend their city with a vigor that exceeds either's individual powers.

name: Primal Scholar
shortDescription: Primal scholars are spellcasters bent on uncovering and mastering the ancient magic that lies buried in the jungles, deserts, and mountains of Xen'drik.
shortDescriptionHtml: Primal scholars are spellcasters bent on uncovering and mastering the ancient magic that lies buried in the jungles, deserts, and mountains of Xen'drik.

name: Shadow Sun Ninja
shortDescription: A Shadow Sun ninja is a martial artist who studies the balance between good and evil, light and dark.
shortDescriptionHtml: A Shadow Sun ninja is a martial artist who studies the balance between good and evil, light and dark.

name: Battle Scion
shortDescription: This prestige class is for the wielders of legendary weapons made for the hands of fighters, barbarians, rangers, monks, and the occasional paladin.
shortDescriptionHtml: This prestige class is for the wielders of legendary weapons made for the hands of fighters, barbarians, rangers, monks, and the occasional paladin.

name: Cavelord
shortDescription: A passion for the narrow, dim ways of the world burns in the breast of the cavelord.
shortDescriptionHtml: A passion for the narrow, dim ways of the world burns in the breast of the cavelord.

name: Death Master
shortDescription: A servant of Orcus who commands legions of undead and is a master of necromancy.
shortDescriptionHtml: A servant of Orcus who commands legions of undead and is a master of necromancy.

name: Jester
shortDescription: A prankster who uses his cutting wit and spells to inspire his allies and manipulate his enemies.
shortDescriptionHtml: A prankster who uses his cutting wit and spells to inspire his allies and manipulate his enemies.

name: Arcanopath Monk
shortDescription: Martial arts and a hatred of Spellcasters combine to produce a killer feared and hunted by wizards and sorcerers.
shortDescriptionHtml: Martial arts and a hatred of Spellcasters combine to produce a killer feared and hunted by wizards and sorcerers.

name: Psychic Theurge
shortDescription: Similar in nature to the mystic theurge and the cerebremancer, the psychic theurge combines psionics with the divine.
shortDescriptionHtml: Similar in nature to the mystic theurge and the cerebremancer, the psychic theurge combines psionics with the divine.

name: Hathran
shortDescription: Hathrans comprise an elite sisterhood of spellcasters who lead Rashemen.
shortDescriptionHtml: Hathrans comprise an elite sisterhood of spellcasters who lead Rashemen.

name: Dread Commando
shortDescription: Dread commandos are the elite scouts and strike force of a well-trained mercenary band.
shortDescriptionHtml: Dread commandos are the elite scouts and strike force of a well-trained mercenary band.

name: Sunmaster
shortDescription: The sunmasters are members of a sect within the church of Lathander who believe that the Morninglord is the living reincarnation of Amaunator.
shortDescriptionHtml: The sunmasters are members of a sect within the church of Lathander who believe that the Morninglord is the living reincarnation of Amaunator.

name: True Necromancer
shortDescription: Those who seek to raise an unyielding obedience from the dead willingly tread the path of necromancy.
shortDescriptionHtml: Those who seek to raise an unyielding obedience from the dead willingly tread the path of necromancy.

name: Elemental Scion of Zilargo
shortDescription: The elemental scion of Zilargo attempts to understand the true nature of the elements through bizarre methods.
shortDescriptionHtml: The elemental scion of Zilargo attempts to understand the true nature of the elements through bizarre methods.

name: Maho-tsukai
shortDescription: Maho (blood magic) wielders are called maho-tsukai.
shortDescriptionHtml: Maho (blood magic) wielders are called maho-tsukai.

name: Moto Avenger
shortDescription: The Moto avenger is dedicated to a war against the Shadowlands and its evils.
shortDescriptionHtml: The Moto avenger is dedicated to a war against the Shadowlands and its evils.

name: Shintao Monk
shortDescription: Shintao monks are dedicated to following the teachings of Shinsei, both to further their own quest for enlightenment and to continue his crusade against the evil of the Shadowlands.
shortDescriptionHtml: Shintao monks are dedicated to following the teachings of Shinsei, both to further their own quest for enlightenment and to continue his crusade against the evil of the Shadowlands.

name: Yakuza
shortDescription: The yakuzas are many different things, depending on who is asked. Some call them protectors of the common folk, others think of them as thugs and extortionists, still others rely on them as an unofficial police force. They are simultaneously despised and respected, sometimes even supported by the local authorities. On one hand, they represent the shadowy underworld, directing and controlling local activities. On the other hand, they provide protection for the helpless and watch over those in their care. Of course, such care has a price, and that is how the yakuzas make their living.

Some call them protectors of the common folk, others think of them as thugs and extortionists, still others rely on them as an unofficial police force. They are simultaneously despised and respected, sometimes even supported by the local authorities. On one hand, they represent the shadowy underworld, directing and controlling local activities. On the other hand, they provide protection for the helpless and watch over those in their care. Of course, such care has a price, and that is how the yakuzas make their living.

name: High Elemental Binder
shortDescription: As a high elemental binder, you can reach into the planes and immediately draw elemental beings into objects -- coating your armor in stone or your blade in fire.
shortDescriptionHtml: As a high elemental binder, you can reach into the planes and immediately draw elemental beings into objects — coating your armor in stone or your blade in fire.

name: Court Herald
shortDescription: The court herald prestige class is a modified version of the loremaster prestige class, which is described in the Dungeon Master's Guide.
shortDescriptionHtml: The court herald prestige class is a modified version of the loremaster prestige class, which is described in the Dungeon Master's Guide.

name: Morninglord of Lathander
shortDescription: Morninglords are, in many ways, the epitome of the classical cleric archetype.
shortDescriptionHtml: Morninglords are, in many ways, the epitome of the classical cleric archetype.

name: Yathrinshee
shortDescription: Yathrinshees, the elite ranks of Kiaransalee's priests, are powerful masters of necromantic magic, both arcane and divine.
shortDescriptionHtml: Yathrinshees, the elite ranks of Kiaransalee's priests, are powerful masters of necromantic magic, both arcane and divine.

name: Zhentarim Spy
shortDescription: The Zhentarim spy is probably the one Faer�nians encounter most often -- even if they never realize it.
shortDescriptionHtml: The Zhentarim spy is probably the one Faer�nians encounter most often — even if they never realize it.

name: Defiant
shortDescription: Defiants take the teaching of the Athar to heart in a way that grants them tremendous powers against those who claim to wield divine might.
shortDescriptionHtml: Defiants take the teaching of the Athar to heart in a way that grants them tremendous powers against those who claim to wield divine might.

name: Fatemaker
shortDescription: "There are two paths to take; one is easy, and that is its only reward."
shortDescriptionHtml: "There are two paths to take; one is easy, and that is its only reward."

name: Chameleon
shortDescription: Chameleons are dilettantes in every class and masters of none.
shortDescriptionHtml: Chameleons are dilettantes in every class and masters of none.

name: Disciple of the Eye
shortDescription: As a disciple of the eye, you know the messages that the eyes alone can impart.
shortDescriptionHtml: As a disciple of the eye, you know the messages that the eyes alone can impart.

name: Moonspeaker
shortDescription: Bound to the magic of their lycanthrope ancestors, moonspeakers breathe the magic of the world, guided by the twelve moons of Eberron.
shortDescriptionHtml: Bound to the magic of their lycanthrope ancestors, moonspeakers breathe the magic of the world, guided by the twelve moons of Eberron.

name: Iron Mind
shortDescription: Elite warriors trained to resist mental compulsions of all kinds, members of the iron mind prestige class defend dwarf and gnome kingdoms against intrusions by mind flayers, dark elf enchanters, and the like.
shortDescriptionHtml: Elite warriors trained to resist mental compulsions of all kinds, members of the iron mind prestige class defend dwarf and gnome kingdoms against intrusions by mind flayers, dark elf enchanters, and the like.

name: Citadel Elite
shortDescription: The elite agent of the Citadel is the best of the best, saved for the most dangerous, most important assignments or granted latitude to serve the King and Crown as he sees fit.
shortDescriptionHtml: The elite agent of the Citadel is the best of the best, saved for the most dangerous, most important assignments or granted latitude to serve the King and Crown as he sees fit.

name: Naga Overlord
shortDescription: Naga overlords are evil masterminds who operate in secret, usually behind cults of devoted followers.
shortDescriptionHtml: Naga overlords are evil masterminds who operate in secret, usually behind cults of devoted followers.

name: Yuan-ti Cultist
shortDescription: The mysteries of the evil deities of the yuan-ti are mastered by yuan-ti cultist masters.
shortDescriptionHtml: The mysteries of the evil deities of the yuan-ti are mastered by yuan-ti cultist masters.

name: Tainted Warrior
shortDescription: When a character's taint threatens to exceed the capacity of his body and soul to contain it, he may become possessed by its evil power and transformed into a creature of taint.
shortDescriptionHtml: When a character's taint threatens to exceed the capacity of his body and soul to contain it, he may become possessed by its evil power and transformed into a creature of taint.

name: Shou Disciple
shortDescription: Shou disciples are martial artists who have studied or observed the monks of Kara-Tur and seek to emulate their style.
shortDescriptionHtml: Shou disciples are martial artists who have studied or observed the monks of Kara-Tur and seek to emulate their style.

name: Drow Judicator
shortDescription: A mortal imbued with fiendish cruelty, the drow judicator is a knight most foul.
shortDescriptionHtml: A mortal imbued with fiendish cruelty, the drow judicator is a knight most foul.

name: Illithid Body Tamer
shortDescription: Illithids who embrace the Tamer Creed believe that military might is the most important factor in their race's future mastery of the multiverse.
shortDescriptionHtml: Illithids who embrace the Tamer Creed believe that military might is the most important factor in their race's future mastery of the multiverse.

name: Psion Uncarnate
shortDescription:
Formless, ?eshless, and unbound by the limits of corporeality�this is the goal of every psion uncarnate. �Flesh is weak, but mind is strong,� or so goes the mantra taught by the Golden Mind. The Golden Mind�s origin is rumored to be offworld or offplane, and the Golden Mind is said to be an entity that has lost its way home (or has been exiled; the truth is unclear). What is clear is that the Golden Mind teaches a potent skill�the ability to loose one�s spirit from its shell and become a psion uncarnate.

Only  hardcore  manifesters are likely to be drawn to becoming uncarnate. Thus, psions and wilders most often take the uncarnate path, while combat specialists such as psychic warriors are happy in their physicality.

name: Fangshields Barbarian
shortDescription: Barbarians of the Fangshields have few worries about traps, because they spend most of their time in their home territory rather than crawling through dungeons. They train their bodies to their physical peak so they can be the shock troops of the organization, relying on their speed and strength to decimate enemy creatures quickly. Other monsters can fight in formation against massed enemies, but the Fangshields barbarians are skilled at charging opposing monsters and battering them with a few powerful hits.

Other monsters can fight in formation against massed enemies, but the Fangshields barbarians are skilled at charging opposing monsters and battering them with a few powerful hits.

name: Holy Judge (Paladin)
shortDescription: This group of Tyr-worshiping paladins is focused primarily on its god's lawful aspects. The Holy Judges hunt and punish criminals and lawbreakers, and they have a fervent hatred for devils, which they see as a terrible perversion of a lawful society.

name: Shadow Adept
shortDescription: Shadow adepts hurl themselves into the abyss of the Shadow Weave, immediately acquiring all the gifts available to casual students and discovering secrets unavailable to all but the most dedicated.

name: Bone Collector
shortDescription: A bone collector is a person who draws personal power from the destruction of undead.
shortDescriptionHtml: A bone collector is a person who draws personal power from the destruction of undead.

name: Ghost Slayer
shortDescription: The ghost slayer studies ghost so that they can be dispatched easily and no longer bother the living with their presence.
shortDescriptionHtml: The ghost slayer studies ghost so that they can be dispatched easily and no longer bother the living with their presence.

name: Legendary Leader
shortDescription: Legendary leaders are the stufffards' tales come to life.
shortDescriptionHtml: Legendary leaders are the stufffards' tales come to life.

name: Death Delver
shortDescription: The death delver is that rare individual, who, rather than fearing and avoiding death, delves as deeply into its mysteries as he can, to better understand and eventually gain some small power over it.
shortDescriptionHtml: The death delver is that rare individual, who, rather than fearing and avoiding death, delves as deeply into its mysteries as he can, to better understand and eventually gain some small power over it.

shortDescription: Any vampire can create spawn, but it takes a very special vampire to rule over an entire gang of minions.
shortDescriptionHtml: Any vampire can create spawn, but it takes a very special vampire to rule over an entire gang of minions.

shortDescription: A sanctified mind believes that all evil-aligned psionics-using creatures must be crushed.

name: Savant Aboleth

name: Deadgrim

shortDescriptionHtml: The deadgrim are an elite faction with in the Red Watchers, a new organization of undead hunters within Karrnath.

name: Dragon Prophet
shortDescription: The dragon prophet is a member of one of the "lesser races" who shares the dragons' ambitious goal of understanding the complex and convoluted draconic Prophecy.

name: Spinemeld Warrior
shortDescription: When a spinemeld warrior trains, he is participating in a tradition that has long been venerated in skarn society.
shortDescriptionHtml: When a spinemeld warrior trains, he is participating in a tradition that has long been venerated in skarn society.

name: Divine Agent
shortDescription: The divine agent is a specially selected agent of her deity, and she acts in the service of that power or deity.
shortDescriptionHtml: The divine agent is a specially selected agent of her deity, and she acts in the service of that power or deity.

name: Eunuch Warlock
shortDescription: Eunuchs are the power behind the throne of a decadent, corrupt emperor. Eunuchs serve as spies, couriers, and informants, while eunuch warlocks are the elite leaders of this group of the emperor's most loyal minions. In some cases, provincial governors even report directly to one or more eunuchs, not to the emperor himself.

name: Loredelver
shortDescription: Loredelvers are illumian spellcasters who find and explore ruins, disable the magical protections that guard them, and sift through the ancient secrets found within.

name: Quori Nightmare
shortDescription: The quori nightmare taps into the primal horrors and urges of the subconscious.
shortDescriptionHtml: The quori nightmare taps into the primal horrors and urges of the subconscious.

name: Lasher
shortDescription: The lasher prestige class uses the whip as an extension of herself.
shortDescriptionHtml: The lasher prestige class uses the whip as an extension of herself.

name: Halruaan Magehound
shortDescription: Magehounds are Halruaa's inquisitors.
shortDescriptionHtml: Magehounds are Halruaa's inquisitors.

name: Fist of Dal Quor
shortDescription: The Fists of Dal Quor are a combat order drawing supernatural power from the Region of Dreams.
shortDescriptionHtml: The Fists of Dal Quor are a combat order drawing supernatural power from the Region of Dreams.

name: Sea Witch
shortDescription: A sea witch is a terrible chaotic mage who wields the powers of water and calls on the living horrors of the deep.
shortDescriptionHtml: A sea witch is a terrible chaotic mage who wields the powers of water and calls on the living horrors of the deep.

name: Bereft
shortDescription: The bereft are a group of truenamers who devote themselves to mastering the word of unmaking, a powerful component of Truespeech purportedly able to unravel creation.
shortDescriptionHtml: The bereft are a group of truenamers who devote themselves to mastering the word of unmaking, a powerful component of Truespeech purportedly able to unravel creation.

name: Prime Underdark Guide
shortDescription: These skilled guides not only know how to overcome the physical challenges of the Underdark, but they also can help them over the social and cultural hurdles they are sure to face.
shortDescriptionHtml: These skilled guides not only know how to overcome the physical challenges of the Underdark, but they also can help them over the social and cultural hurdles they are sure to face.

name: Vermin Keeper
shortDescription: To a vermin keeper, insects are perfect killers.
shortDescriptionHtml: To a vermin keeper, insects are perfect killers.

name: Fist of Zuoken
shortDescription:
The Fists of Zuoken are members of an order of martial artists devoted to mastering their own physical and mental development while protecting psions and other psionic creatures. The fists of Zuoken believe that mental powers are to be nurtured in all who possess them. In addition to their formidable prowess in combat, fists of Zuoken develop mental powers that surprise and astound their enemies. 

Almost all fists of Zuoken are monks who are affiliated with a specific order created to guard centers of psionic learning�usually fortresses in the middle of forbidding wastelands. Naturally, the monks learned from the psionic masters as well, and thus the fists of Zuoken were born.

name: Moonsea Skysentinel
shortDescription: Moonsea skysentinels are the eyes in the sky for the Knights of the North, scouting the landscape, looking for evidence of Zhentarim activity. They employ trained dire hawks as swift aerial mounts and a variety of combat tactics that allow them to swoop in, strike enemies quickly, and race away again before reinforcements can arrive. Whether spying on a caravan flying the banner of the Black Network, delivering battle orders to a Knight raiding party, or hunting and dueling one of the hated Zhentarim skymages, a Moonsea skysentinel is the light cavalry of the Knights' forces.

shortDescription: These kind and enduring monks dedicated to Ilmater are focused on defending the faithful and temples of the Broken God while acting as agents of punishment against those who would cruelly harm others. They combine the skills of healer and hunter in the service of their deity. They often assist other servants of the Triad when injustices against the innocent have occurred.

name: Shadow Sword (Ranger)
shortDescription: Rangers of the Knights of the Shadow Sword patrol Myth Drannor and attempt to rid it of the evils living there. They use their stealth and spell-power to aid the fighters of their order.
shortDescriptionHtml: Rangers of the Knights of the Shadow Sword patrol Myth Drannor and attempt to rid it of the evils living there. They use their stealth and spell-power to aid the fighters of their order.

name: Pixie
shortDescription: Pixies are pranksters and greatly enjoy leading travelers astray, but some break out of this simple mentality and try to learn more about their world, seek great treasures, or avenge a particular insult to themselves, their people, or their homeland.

shortDescription: Sacred purifiers are priestly characters who specialize in destroying undead.
shortDescriptionHtml: Sacred purifiers are priestly characters who specialize in destroying undead.

shortDescriptionHtml: The windrider is a specialist in mounted combat, but hers is no ordinary mount.

name: Celebrant of Sharess
shortDescription: Celebrants of Sharess are seducers and warriors, hedonists and pious champions of good.
shortDescriptionHtml: Celebrants of Sharess are seducers and warriors, hedonists and pious champions of good.

shortDescription: Having already offered his life in sacrifice once, the martyred champion of Ilmater perseveres in Ilmater's faith.

name: Knight of the Raven
shortDescription: Before evil descended on the land of Barovia, it was home to an order of virtuous champions, the Knights of the Raven.
shortDescriptionHtml: Before evil descended on the land of Barovia, it was home to an order of virtuous champions, the Knights of the Raven.

name: Outcast Champion
shortDescription: Outcast champions bring hope to those who have no place in society.
shortDescriptionHtml: Outcast champions bring hope to those who have no place in society.

name: Dragon Devotee

name: Dragonheart Mage
shortDescription: The dragonheart mage is perfect for the dedicated spellcaster who wishes to embrace the power of dragon blood while still advancing in magical expertise.
shortDescriptionHtml: The dragonheart mage is perfect for the dedicated spellcaster who wishes to embrace the power of dragon blood while still advancing in magical expertise.

name: Spellcarved Soldier
shortDescription: Spellcarved soldiers are warforged warriors who engrave magic runes into the plating of their inherently magic bodies, gaining remarkable defensive abilities.
shortDescriptionHtml: Spellcarved soldiers are warforged warriors who engrave magic runes into the plating of their inherently magic bodies, gaining remarkable defensive abilities.

name: Walker In the Waste
shortDescription: A walker in the waste embodies the harsh, unforgiving nature of the desert.
shortDescriptionHtml: A walker in the waste embodies the harsh, unforgiving nature of the desert.

name: Knight Protector of the Great Kingdom
shortDescription: Knight protectors are martial characters dedicated to restoring the ideals of knightly chivalry before they fade forever.
shortDescriptionHtml: Knight protectors are martial characters dedicated to restoring the ideals of knightly chivalry before they fade forever.

name: Twisted Lord
shortDescription: The stealthy assassins of the Ebon Cabal, twisted lords can turn their visages fearsome at a moment's notice.
shortDescriptionHtml: The stealthy assassins of the Ebon Cabal, twisted lords can turn their visages fearsome at a moment's notice.

name: Master of Vipers
shortDescription: Outcast yuan-ti learn to hunt not only to feed themselves, but also to spread destruction far and wide for the pure pleasure of it.
shortDescriptionHtml: Outcast yuan-ti learn to hunt not only to feed themselves, but also to spread destruction far and wide for the pure pleasure of it.

name: Survivor
shortDescription: Those who survive a program of frequent assaults and other dangers emerge a few weeks later -- tougher, faster, and less vulnerable to attacks.
shortDescriptionHtml: Those who survive a program of frequent assaults and other dangers emerge a few weeks later — tougher, faster, and less vulnerable to attacks.

name: Stormcaster
shortDescription: The stormcaster is one who seeks to tap into the power of a strange and terrifying phenomenon: the raging storm.
shortDescriptionHtml: The stormcaster is one who seeks to tap into the power of a strange and terrifying phenomenon: the raging storm.

name: Witch Slayer
shortDescription: Witch slayers devote themselves to capturing and destroying those who share their souls with other entities.
shortDescriptionHtml: Witch slayers devote themselves to capturing and destroying those who share their souls with other entities.

name: Shadowsmith
shortDescription: Shadowcasters draw power from darkness, and masters of shadow command it, but no one truly manipulates the darkness as does the shadowsmith.
shortDescriptionHtml: Shadowcasters draw power from darkness, and masters of shadow command it, but no one truly manipulates the darkness as does the shadowsmith.

name: Ruby Knight Vindicator
shortDescription: The Ruby Knights are a crusader order in the service of Wee Jas, goddess of death and magic.
shortDescriptionHtml: The Ruby Knights are a crusader order in the service of Wee Jas, goddess of death and magic.

name: Cleric Variant
shortDescription: Some clerics prefer to be champions of good (or evil), standing at the forefront of the battle against the enemy.
shortDescriptionHtml: Some clerics prefer to be champions of good (or evil), standing at the forefront of the battle against the enemy.

name: Abjurer Variant
shortDescription:
Masters of protective magic, abjurers can fill many roles in a campaign, from bodyguard to battlemage to adventurer. Although it lacks offensive options, the school of abjuration provides some of the most effective combat spells in the game. An evoker or transmuter might find it easier to bring down large groups of foes, but an abjurer is far more likely to bring herself and her companions through a fight alive.

In a campaign with a high degree of intrigue or political machinations, the protective abilities of an abjurer can guard against foes both obvious and unexpected, and rival groups of abjurers, all with slightly different powers, might vie for prom inence among each nation's schemers and courtiers. In combat-heavy campaigns, realms might employ abjuration specialists to protect against the battle magic of their rivals, and in any campaign, adventurers might come to rely on the skills of an abjurer to protect against the dangers of dungeon and wilderness.

In combat-heavy campaigns, realms might employ abjuration specialists to protect against the battle magic of their rivals, and in any campaign, adventurers might come to rely on the skills of an abjurer to protect against the dangers of dungeon and wilderness.

name: Diviner Variant
shortDescription:
Seekers of knowledge, hoarders of lore, and master spies, diviners are perhaps the most underrated specialist wizards. Because they must give up access to only one other school of magic, they are also the most versatile specialists. More than any other specialists, diviners excel at gathering information, and an adventuring party that includes a diviner is much more likely to prepare properly for an adventure.

Many campaigns benefit from featuring more than one type of divination specialist, and diviners can play important parts in any game revolving around information gathering. Campaigns that feature mysteries and detective-style adventures, themes of prophecy and oracles, or large amounts of social interaction and espionage all make excellent forums for a diviner's powers. In campaigns that feature variant diviners with different class abilities, one simple way to add more variety is to make each distinct group of specialists experts in and proponents of a different form of divination. In game terms, this divergence is represented by altering the material components for some divination spells. For example, one group of diviners might favor osteomancy and require a collection of bones to use as components for their spells.

shortDescription: The flux adept learns to use her magic to alter and control her body.

shortDescription: The wizards of the order study and exchange information, create magic items to help support the guild's financial independence, and offer their services to others in the city as watch-wizards or fire guards.
shortDescriptionHtml: The wizards of the order study and exchange information, create magic items to help support the guild's financial independence, and offer their services to others in the city as watch-wizards or fire guards.

shortDescriptionHtml: The skullclan hunter is the acclaimed foe of unlife.

shortDescriptionHtml: A warchief leads a primitive, aggressive tribe of humanoids, especially when they turn to marauding.

name: Dracolexi
shortDescription: As a dracolexi, you try to understand that primordial vocabulary by devoting yourself to the study of ancient dialects and languages, hoping to discover how certain Draconic words were once uttered.

shortDescription: Ghostwalkers have abilities that point to some underlying, mysterious mysticism.
shortDescriptionHtml: Ghostwalkers have abilities that point to some underlying, mysterious mysticism.

name: Master Samurai
shortDescription: The master samurai is a military retainer of a feudal overlord; he practices a code of behavior that emphasizes the value of personal honor over life itself.

shortDescription: The Red Avenger is the master of ki,an ancient and formidable discipline that allows the user to accomplish the extraordinary.
shortDescriptionHtml: The Red Avenger is the master of ki,an ancient and formidable discipline that allows the user to accomplish the extraordinary.

shortDescription: The tribal protector is the battlefield champion of a savage humanoid race.
shortDescriptionHtml: The tribal protector is the battlefield champion of a savage humanoid race.

shortDescriptionHtml: Dark scholars are arcanists who have delved deeply into texts regarded as too revolutionary or too dangerous for others.

shortDescriptionHtml: Those yuan-ti who grow mightier of mind and gain additional psionic powers are called ancient masters.

shortDescriptionHtml: The master of flies is an intelligent swarm that can form a massive being at need, or a single creature that can dissolve into a cloud of vermin.

name: Knight of the Pearl
shortDescription: The knight of the pearl is a loyal defender of the aventi people, dedicated to the service of Aventernus and his appointed kings.
shortDescriptionHtml: The knight of the pearl is a loyal defender of the aventi people, dedicated to the service of Aventernus and his appointed kings.

name: Legendary Captain
shortDescription: A legendary captain might be the commander of a fleet's flagship or a bloodthirsty pirate, but whatever the role, her reputation is widespread and her crew fanatically loyal.
shortDescriptionHtml: A legendary captain might be the commander of a fleet's flagship or a bloodthirsty pirate, but whatever the role, her reputation is widespread and her crew fanatically loyal.

name: Scorpion Wraith
shortDescription: Scorpion wraiths are the elite warriors of the drow.
shortDescriptionHtml: Scorpion wraiths are the elite warriors of the drow.

name: Master of Shadow
shortDescription: Some driven or domineering souls seek nothing less than mastery of darkness itself -- the ability to turn the very shadows into their agents and allies.
shortDescriptionHtml: Some driven or domineering souls seek nothing less than mastery of darkness itself — the ability to turn the very shadows into their agents and allies.

name: Disciple of the Word
shortDescription: Disciples of the word are intellectual warrior monks who, through a deeper understanding of their truenames, transcend the limits of their mortal form.
shortDescriptionHtml: Disciples of the word are intellectual warrior monks who, through a deeper understanding of their truenames, transcend the limits of their mortal form.

name: Prestige Ranger
shortDescription: The prestige ranger navigates the dark forests, craggy mountains, or desert wastes of her homeland with unparalleled skill.
shortDescriptionHtml: The prestige ranger navigates the dark forests, craggy mountains, or desert wastes of her homeland with unparalleled skill.

name: Durthan
shortDescription: Durthans are an order of spellcasters who tap into the darker spirits of Rashemen.
shortDescriptionHtml: Durthans are an order of spellcasters who tap into the darker spirits of Rashemen.

name: Cerebremancer
shortDescription: Cerebremancers access both the arcane mysteries of spellcasting and the psionic powers of the mind.
shortDescriptionHtml: Cerebremancers access both the arcane mysteries of spellcasting and the psionic powers of the mind.

name: Phoenix Disciple (Monk)
shortDescription: The Disciples of the Phoenix are unusual lawful good Kossuthan monks. They are extremely disciplined and take some of their beliefs to painful extremes. Obsessed with the power of fire to purify, they have developed strange monk abilities based on that concept.
shortDescriptionHtml: The Disciples of the Phoenix are unusual lawful good Kossuthan monks. They are extremely disciplined and take some of their beliefs to painful extremes. Obsessed with the power of fire to purify, they have developed strange monk abilities based on that concept.

name: Purple Staff (Cleric)
shortDescription: The Followers of the Purple Staff are a group of divine spellcasters trying to create a benign theocracy in the eastern part of the Dragon Coast. These clerics carry a great deal of political power within the borders of the so-called "Holy Realm" and use their magic to aid the citizens of their new land.

name: Druid Variant
shortDescription: The druid might choose to give up her wild shape ability in exchange for becoming a swift and deadly hunter.
shortDescriptionHtml: The druid might choose to give up her wild shape ability in exchange for becoming a swift and deadly hunter.

name: Dread Witch

shortDescriptionHtml: The dread witch is a spellcaster who manipulates fear as readily and effectively as other casters manipulate magic itself.

name: Glorious Servitor
shortDescription:
"Let the enemies of my lord and god fall before my might. I am his chosen, and I shall let none stand who dare oppose his will!"
-Netheris Ket, Glorious Servitor of Sebek

Glorious Servitors are exceptionally loyal and devout servants of the Mulhorandi gods. Exalted above most other mortals, a glorious servitor strives to live an exemplary life that embodies her deity's beliefs and values. She has many rivals and enemies both inside and outside her deity's cult, but she welcomes any challenge that gives her an opportunity to demonstrate her faithfulness and dedication.

name: Mage-killer
shortDescription: Mage-killers master magic designed for combat against other spellcasters.
shortDescriptionHtml: Mage-killers master magic designed for combat against other spellcasters.

name: Dragon Samurai
shortDescription: Dragon samurai are dedicated warriors, members of a special, self-selected class who revered dragonkind and emulate dragons' ferocious martial abilities to the point of taking on some draconic traits.
shortDescriptionHtml: Dragon samurai are dedicated warriors, members of a special, self-selected class who revered dragonkind and emulate dragons' ferocious martial abilities to the point of taking on some draconic traits.

name: Havoc Mage
shortDescription: The havoc mage shares as much in common with a fighter as with a wizard.
shortDescriptionHtml: The havoc mage shares as much in common with a fighter as with a wizard.

name: Necrocarnate
shortDescription: Dealers in death and torturers of souls, necrocarnates number among the most evil creatures in any world.
shortDescriptionHtml: Dealers in death and torturers of souls, necrocarnates number among the most evil creatures in any world.

name: Henshin Mystic
shortDescription: Henshin mystics are members of a monastic order that teaches what they consider a great mystery of the universe: that humanity is capable of a transformation (henshin) into divinity. Their training and discipline is aimed toward the ultimate perfection not only of themselves, but of all humanity. They believe this perfection is the future of the world and of humanity, and this belief fills them with a hopeful peace.

Their training and discipline is aimed toward the ultimate perfection not only of themselves, but of all humanity. They believe this perfection is the future of the world and of humanity, and this belief fills them with a hopeful peace.

name: Weapon Master (Kensei)
shortDescription: For weapon masters (kensei), the perfection of _ki_ is found in the mastery of a single melee weapon. Weapon masters seek to unite this weapon of choice with the body, to make them one, and to use the weapon as naturally and without thought as any other limb.
shortDescriptionHtml: For weapon masters (kensei), the perfection of ki is found in the mastery of a single melee weapon. Weapon masters seek to unite this weapon of choice with the body, to make them one, and to use the weapon as naturally and without thought as any other limb.

name: Merchant Prince
shortDescription: A merchant prince (known as a merchant princess if female) is a member of the merchant nobility who has acquired his position and wealth either by being born into a wealthy family or by earning every last coin himself.
shortDescriptionHtml: A merchant prince (known as a merchant princess if female) is a member of the merchant nobility who has acquired his position and wealth either by being born into a wealthy family or by earning every last coin himself.

name: Eye of Horus-re
shortDescription: Eyes of Horus-Re are champions of good, sworn enemies of Set, and bane to undead.
shortDescriptionHtml: Eyes of Horus-Re are champions of good, sworn enemies of Set, and bane to undead.

name: Astral Dancer
shortDescription: A few skilled combatants learn to take advantage of conditions on the Astral Plane.
shortDescriptionHtml: A few skilled combatants learn to take advantage of conditions on the Astral Plane.

name: Great Rift Skyguard
shortDescription: The hippogriff-mounted skyguards of the Great Rift patrol the skies, ever watchful for the enemies of the gold dwarves.
shortDescriptionHtml: The hippogriff-mounted skyguards of the Great Rift patrol the skies, ever watchful for the enemies of the gold dwarves.

name: Arcane Hierophant
shortDescription: Arcane hierophants wield a blending of arcane magic and divine magic with a heavy emphasis on nature and the elements.
shortDescriptionHtml: Arcane hierophants wield a blending of arcane magic and divine magic with a heavy emphasis on nature and the elements.

name: Jordain Vizier
shortDescription: The Jordaini are a special servitor caste, though still upper class, in the magocracy of Halruaa.
shortDescriptionHtml: The Jordaini are a special servitor caste, though still upper class, in the magocracy of Halruaa.

name: Wild Scout
shortDescription: Wild scouts are the spies of the wilderness, traversing the open and wild country in search of valuable information.
shortDescriptionHtml: Wild scouts are the spies of the wilderness, traversing the open and wild country in search of valuable information.

name: Scarlet Corsair
shortDescription: The scarlet corsair relies on the reputation of her quick blade and terrible fighting skills to drive her prey before her.
shortDescriptionHtml: The scarlet corsair relies on the reputation of her quick blade and terrible fighting skills to drive her prey before her.

name: Acolyte of the Ego
shortDescription: By learning to speak their own truenames, acolytes of the ego strive to unlock hidden powers lost to the cosmos.
shortDescriptionHtml: By learning to speak their own truenames, acolytes of the ego strive to unlock hidden powers lost to the cosmos.

name: Raumathari Battlemage
shortDescription: Employing sword and spell with dauntless courage and deadly force, the handful of Raumathari battlemages remaining in the world comprise a lonely and little-known order of adventurers, explorers, and mercenaries in search of battle.
shortDescriptionHtml: Employing sword and spell with dauntless courage and deadly force, the handful of Raumathari battlemages remaining in the world comprise a lonely and little-known order of adventurers, explorers, and mercenaries in search of battle.

name: Imaskari Vengeance Taker
shortDescription: A secret society dedicated to righting wrongs, the Imaskari vengeance takers are trained by hidden masters in the rites and rituals of revenge.
shortDescriptionHtml: A secret society dedicated to righting wrongs, the Imaskari vengeance takers are trained by hidden masters in the rites and rituals of revenge.

name: Knight of the Weave
shortDescription: Over a dozen deities have worshipers who are paladins, promoting law and good across Faer�n, but it is the Weave itself that empowers and strengthens the Knights of the Weave. Distinct from the worship of Mystra, members of this mystic order of sacred defenders cherish the Weave like a fine wine, knowing that its existence enriches all of Faer�n. They drink deeply of its power, use that energy to extend its reach, and utterly smash those who would hurt the object of their love. Their power comes from pure magic, and unlike typical paladins, their power is arcane rather than divine. Over time they become imbued with the power of the Weave, capable of unleashing magic in its raw form.

name: Golden Lion (Paladin)
shortDescription: The Order of the Golden Lion serves Torm and was created specifi cally to serve the Penance of Duty accepted by those of his faith. Members of the order are a varied bunch but united in their devotion and strength of purpose. They develop special powers to defend good temples, defeat Faer�nian evils, and repair damage to the Weave.

Members of the order are a varied bunch but united in their devotion and strength of purpose. They develop special powers to defend good temples, defeat Faer�nian evils, and repair damage to the Weave.

name: Illusionist Variant
shortDescription:
Illusionists control their surroundings by shaping, distorting, and deceiving the perceptions of others. To some their abilities seem weak, because they only distort and disguise rather than effecting true change, but those affected by an illusionist's spells know better, understanding that their own senses can be turned against them at any time.

Campaigns that deal in deception or that have a high level of social interaction, a fair number of mystery adventures, or even simply suspicious players can benefit from the introduction of variant illusionists. Campaigns featuring multiple types of variant illusionists might give each group or variant an even more distinctive flavor by making each the master of a particular subset of illusion spells. Illusionists from one nation might, for example, have the chains of disbelief variant ability and favor phantasms, while the illusionist thieves of the Guild of Shadows might have the shadow shaper variant ability and favor glamers and shadow magic.

name: Purifier of the Hallowed Doctrine
shortDescription: Purifiers of the Hallowed Doctrine consider themselves servants not of gods but of the spiritual well-being of the world itself.
shortDescriptionHtml: Purifiers of the Hallowed Doctrine consider themselves servants not of gods but of the spiritual well-being of the world itself.

name: Topaz Guardian
shortDescription: Resolute crusaders, the topaz guardians are the elite initiates of the Holy Order of the Supernal Topaz Defenders.
shortDescriptionHtml: Resolute crusaders, the topaz guardians are the elite initiates of the Holy Order of the Supernal Topaz Defenders.

name: Bonded Summoner
shortDescription: He who learns to leash the furies of the Elemental Planes is known as a bonded summoner.
shortDescriptionHtml: He who learns to leash the furies of the Elemental Planes is known as a bonded summoner.

name: Shadow Scout
shortDescription: The camouflage of a tiger, the stamina of a horse, the eyes of an eagle: these are the ingredients of the shadow scouts, elite spies, trackers, and runners. Shadow scouts are trained to blend into their surroundings, to observe and remember the smallest details about an opposing force, and to run like the wind to bring a report back alive.

Shadow scouts are trained to blend into their surroundings, to observe and remember the smallest details about an opposing force, and to run like the wind to bring a report back alive.

name: Monk of the Long Death
shortDescription: Monks of the long death are members of a macabre, secretive order of scholars seeking to understand the true nature of death.
shortDescriptionHtml: Monks of the long death are members of a macabre, secretive order of scholars seeking to understand the true nature of death.

name: Shaaryan Hunter
shortDescription: On the backs of their swift horses, Shaaryan hunters can run down even the fastest prey and either spear it with a lance or pelt it with arrows from horseback.
shortDescriptionHtml: On the backs of their swift horses, Shaaryan hunters can run down even the fastest prey and either spear it with a lance or pelt it with arrows from horseback.

name: Cipher Adept
shortDescription: Seamless integration brings the cipher adept bliss.
shortDescriptionHtml: Seamless integration brings the cipher adept bliss.

name: Scar Enforcer
shortDescription: Scar enforcers are angry, embittered half-elves who have rejected both sides of their ancestry.
shortDescriptionHtml: Scar enforcers are angry, embittered half-elves who have rejected both sides of their ancestry.

name: Devoted Defender
shortDescription: The devoted defender is a professional guardian.
shortDescriptionHtml: The devoted defender is a professional guardian.

name: Crinti Shadow Marauder
shortDescription: Crinti shadow marauders combine the physical prowess of master rider with the stealth of the most cunning shadowdancers.
shortDescriptionHtml: Crinti shadow marauders combine the physical prowess of master rider with the stealth of the most cunning shadowdancers.

name: Luiren Marchwarden
shortDescription: The Luiren marchwarden is the defender of the frontier in the land of the halflings.
shortDescriptionHtml: The Luiren marchwarden is the defender of the frontier in the land of the halflings.

name: Knight-errant of Silverymoon
shortDescription: Charged with the safety of the city of Silverymoon and its citizens, the professional fighting force known as the Knights in Silver is often all that stands between Silverymoon and the dangers of the frontier.
shortDescriptionHtml: Charged with the safety of the city of Silverymoon and its citizens, the professional fighting force known as the Knights in Silver is often all that stands between Silverymoon and the dangers of the frontier.

name: Sybil
shortDescription: Steeped in ancient lore, or maddened by divine inspiration, the sybil is a reclusive prophet.
shortDescriptionHtml: Steeped in ancient lore, or maddened by divine inspiration, the sybil is a reclusive prophet.

name: Child of Night
shortDescription: They prefer to call themselves "black transmogrifists," but most know them as children of night.
shortDescriptionHtml: They prefer to call themselves "black transmogrifists," but most know them as children of night.

name: Faith Scion
shortDescription: This prestige class is meant for characters who wield legendary weapons of divine power for claerics, druids, and paladins.
shortDescriptionHtml: This prestige class is meant for characters who wield legendary weapons of divine power for claerics, druids, and paladins.

name: Tainted Sorcerer
shortDescription: Tainted sorcerers find an easy path to tremendous magical power.
shortDescriptionHtml: Tainted sorcerers find an easy path to tremendous magical power.

name: Shadowcrafter
shortDescription: Shadowcrafters long ago mastered illusions and glamers.
shortDescriptionHtml: Shadowcrafters long ago mastered illusions and glamers.

name: Pyrokineticist
shortDescription:
Pyrokineticists know that a little psionic power goes a long way�for those interested only in fire. They find both beauty and utility in the chaotic shape of flame, its spectrum of fuel-dependent colors, its warming heat, and its never-ending hunger. Those who take one or more levels in the pyrokineticist class are sometimes colloquially referred to as �pyros.�

Pyrokineticists like fire. A lot. Any character with some psionic ability is a possible candidate for this prestige class. Psions (particularly kineticists) and wilders might consider it acceptable to give up power acquisition in other areas if they have a passion for flame. Psychic warriors also enjoy the pyro�s powers. Soulknives often take levels in this class to gain access to the weapon afire ability for their mind blades. Any character with the Wild Talent feat may also find this class appealing.

name: Knight of the Flying Hunt
shortDescription: Fireside tales of noble knights astride graceful winged horses, wearing armor of glass, have enchanted listeners across Faer�n for years. All who hear of such breathtaking imagery are fascinated with thoughts of donning their own suit of magic armor, climbing atop a snowy white pegasus, and taking to the skies in defense of goodness. The stories are a pale imitation of the true glory of the Knights of the Flying Hunt. Defenders of Nimbral, protectors of the island realm's quiet, simple folk, noble soldiers answering to the powerful but mysterious Nimbral Lords--the Knights of the Flying Hunt epitomize valor and grace in word, deed, and bearing.

Defenders of Nimbral, protectors of the island realm's quiet, simple folk, noble soldiers answering to the powerful but mysterious Nimbral Lords—the Knights of the Flying Hunt epitomize valor and grace in word, deed, and bearing.

name: Berronar Valkyrie (Paladin)
shortDescription: Berronar's Valkyries are female dwarf paladins of the goddess Berronar Truesilver. They study tactics and charge into battle to save male dwarf warriors. Their special powers help them look after their allies and punish oathbreakers.
shortDescriptionHtml: Berronar's Valkyries are female dwarf paladins of the goddess Berronar Truesilver. They study tactics and charge into battle to save male dwarf warriors. Their special powers help them look after their allies and punish oathbreakers.

name: Mystic Fire Knight (Paladin)
shortDescription: The Knights of the Mystic Fire serve Mystra by guarding her temples and questing for lost magical troves. They develop increased ability to use magic, counter hostile magic, and defeat enemy spellcasters.
shortDescriptionHtml: The Knights of the Mystic Fire serve Mystra by guarding her temples and questing for lost magical troves. They develop increased ability to use magic, counter hostile magic, and defeat enemy spellcasters.

name: Noble Heart (Paladin)
shortDescription: The Companions of the Noble Heart are aggressive knights in the service of Ilmater who have dedicated themselves to eliminating the evil of those who are known to enjoy the torturing and suffering of others. In particular, they oppose members of the church of Loviatar and destroy them and their temples whenever possible. When servants of the other members of the Triad crusade against Loviatar's servants, Noble Heart knights often join with them.

In particular, they oppose members of the church of Loviatar and destroy them and their temples whenever possible. When servants of the other members of the Triad crusade against Loviatar's servants, Noble Heart knights often join with them.

name: Divine Disciple
shortDescription: Divine disciples interpret the divine will, act as teachers and guides to other members of the clergy, and arm lay followers of their deity with the power of their patron.
shortDescriptionHtml: Divine disciples interpret the divine will, act as teachers and guides to other members of the clergy, and arm lay followers of their deity with the power of their patron.

name: Arboreal Guardian
shortDescription: Within the Spirit Wood are the Arboreal Guardians, men and women dedicated to protecting and ministering the living repositories of elf and half-elf spirits.
shortDescriptionHtml: Within the Spirit Wood are the Arboreal Guardians, men and women dedicated to protecting and ministering the living repositories of elf and half-elf spirits.

name: Combat Medic
shortDescription: The combat medic keeps her allies alive and tends to the fallen on the front lines of battle.
shortDescriptionHtml: The combat medic keeps her allies alive and tends to the fallen on the front lines of battle.

name: Master Alchemist
shortDescription: The master alchemist is a spellcaster who specializes in producing potions and elixirs that reproduce the effects of spells of 4th level or higher.
shortDescriptionHtml: The master alchemist is a spellcaster who specializes in producing potions and elixirs that reproduce the effects of spells of 4th level or higher.

name: Spelldancer
shortDescription: Spelldancers are an energetic sort of spellcaster who draw on the quasi-primal energy of song and dancing to power their magic.
shortDescriptionHtml: Spelldancers are an energetic sort of spellcaster who draw on the quasi-primal energy of song and dancing to power their magic.

name: Tactical Soldier
shortDescription: The tactical soldier is the master of teamwork in melee.
shortDescriptionHtml: The tactical soldier is the master of teamwork in melee.

name: Incarnum Blade
shortDescription: Using a secret passed down through the generations, the incarnum blade shapes soul energy drawn from the greatest warriors of the past into a special soulmeld that is incorporated into his melee weapon of choice.
shortDescriptionHtml: Using a secret passed down through the generations, the incarnum blade shapes soul energy drawn from the greatest warriors of the past into a special soulmeld that is incorporated into his melee weapon of choice.

name: Gatekeeper Mystagogue
shortDescription: Heirs to a tradition over sixteen millennia old, the gatekeeper mystagogues stand among the greated foes of the daelkyr and their aberration spawn.
shortDescriptionHtml: Heirs to a tradition over sixteen millennia old, the gatekeeper mystagogues stand among the greated foes of the daelkyr and their aberration spawn.

name: Revenant Blade
shortDescription: The revenant blade is a Valenar elf who can draw on the skills of ancient heroes, the giant-slayers of Xen'drik.
shortDescriptionHtml: The revenant blade is a Valenar elf who can draw on the skills of ancient heroes, the giant-slayers of Xen'drik.

name: Ardent Dilettante
shortDescription: A diversity of interests and a moderate level of ability in one skill can lead one to become an ardent dilettante.
shortDescriptionHtml: A diversity of interests and a moderate level of ability in one skill can lead one to become an ardent dilettante.

name: Chaotician
shortDescription: Chaoticians seek to enjoy the beauty of the unpredictable, and by seeking to emulate the philosophy of chaos in their actions, they create a fabulous journey through life in which nothing is a bore.
shortDescriptionHtml: Chaoticians seek to enjoy the beauty of the unpredictable, and by seeking to emulate the philosophy of chaos in their actions, they create a fabulous journey through life in which nothing is a bore.

name: Visionary Seeker
shortDescription: A visionary seeker knows how to navigate the mental plain stretching out ahead, finding landfall and truly discovering what it means to know.
shortDescriptionHtml: A visionary seeker knows how to navigate the mental plain stretching out ahead, finding landfall and truly discovering what it means to know.

name: Breachgnome
shortDescription: A breachgnome is a mighty gnome who is skilled in fighting in cramped conditions.
shortDescriptionHtml: A breachgnome is a mighty gnome who is skilled in fighting in cramped conditions.

name: Menacing Brute
shortDescription: The menacing brute takes advantage of how must humans fear half-orcs, playing on that dread to make his living.
shortDescriptionHtml: The menacing brute takes advantage of how must humans fear half-orcs, playing on that dread to make his living.

name: Battlesmith
shortDescription: A battlesmith is a skilled dwarf armorer and weaponsmith who uses her experience in battle, as well as her masterful weaponsmithing and armorsmithing abilities, to create deadly items for her kinsmen to wield in defense of their homes.
shortDescriptionHtml: A battlesmith is a skilled dwarf armorer and weaponsmith who uses her experience in battle, as well as her masterful weaponsmithing and armorsmithing abilities, to create deadly items for her kinsmen to wield in defense of their homes.

name: Solar Channeler
shortDescription: Holy warriors ready to defend the Material Plane against demonic invasion, solar channelers are effective healers and spellcasters until the situation demands melee combat. Then they become furious angels.
shortDescriptionHtml: Holy warriors ready to defend the Material Plane against demonic invasion, solar channelers are effective healers and spellcasters until the situation demands melee combat. Then they become furious angels.

name: Landforged Walker
shortDescription: Even as they speak for nature, landforged walkers coax the living bounty of the earth to grow on their metal hides, drawing power from the environment around them.
shortDescriptionHtml: Even as they speak for nature, landforged walkers coax the living bounty of the earth to grow on their metal hides, drawing power from the environment around them.

name: Tenebrous Apostate
shortDescription: The remnant of divinity once possessed by Orcus, Tenebrous is perhaps the only vestige still worshiped in some places as a god. Some followers, however, believe that Tenebrous is a separate deity, so these Tenebrous apostates revere him as such.
shortDescriptionHtml: The remnant of divinity once possessed by Orcus, Tenebrous is perhaps the only vestige still worshiped in some places as a god. Some followers, however, believe that Tenebrous is a separate deity, so these Tenebrous apostates revere him as such.

name: Bloodstorm Blade
shortDescription: Other martial adepts rightfully look with wonder upon those who learn the bloodstorm style.
shortDescriptionHtml: Other martial adepts rightfully look with wonder upon those who learn the bloodstorm style.

name: Jade Phoenix Mage
shortDescription: Long ago, a fellowship of swordsages known as the Masters of the Jade Phoenix took up the study of arcane magic in search of a new martial discipline.
shortDescriptionHtml: Long ago, a fellowship of swordsages known as the Masters of the Jade Phoenix took up the study of arcane magic in search of a new martial discipline.

name: Prestige Paladin
shortDescription: After training in the arts of combat and the mysteries of the divine, the prestige paladin is anointed as a holy warrior dedicated to the protection of law and goodness.
shortDescriptionHtml: After training in the arts of combat and the mysteries of the divine, the prestige paladin is anointed as a holy warrior dedicated to the protection of law and goodness.

name: Master of the Yuirwood
shortDescription: The masters of the Yuirwood are an elite group of foresters who work to keep the ancient Yuirwood free of evil influence.
shortDescriptionHtml: The masters of the Yuirwood are an elite group of foresters who work to keep the ancient Yuirwood free of evil influence.

name: Thayan Slaver
shortDescription: Thayan slavers are cruel marauders who use their awful abilities to abduct creatures and then break their wills.
shortDescriptionHtml: Thayan slavers are cruel marauders who use their awful abilities to abduct creatures and then break their wills.

name: Illithid Slayer
shortDescription:
A primary illithid slayer credo is �Do or die,� where �do� means �?nd and slay illithids.� Slayers have no use for those with faltering hearts (another of their credos�which, truth be told, number in the hundreds). name: Triadic Knight
shortDescription: Triadic knights are holy warriors who worship the Triad of Tyr, Torm, and Ilmater. Triadic knights trace their history back to the Fiend Wars of Impiltur (729--732 DR), when the three churches joined forces to proclaim the Triad Crusade, but they no longer comprise a single order of paladins. Triadic knights believe that to truly embody the virtues of a paladin, one must draw on the strengths of all three gods. Through courage and perseverance, Triadic knights seek justice for all.

Triadic knights believe that to truly embody the virtues of a paladin, one must draw on the strengths of all three gods. Through courage and perseverance, Triadic knights seek justice for all.

name: Vigilant Eye of Helm (Paladin)
shortDescription: This paladin order of Helm is growing rapidly and impressing the common folk with its members' humility and self-sacrifice. The Vigilant Eyes of Helm defend the innocent from threats and develop special ways of recognizing danger and protecting others.
shortDescriptionHtml: This paladin order of Helm is growing rapidly and impressing the common folk with its members' humility and self-sacrifice. The Vigilant Eyes of Helm defend the innocent from threats and develop special ways of recognizing danger and protecting others.

name: Monk Variant
shortDescription: A monk might choose to give up some of her mobility in exchange for the ability to withstand attacks.
shortDescriptionHtml: A monk might choose to give up some of her mobility in exchange for the ability to withstand attacks.

name: Urban Druid
shortDescription: A master of cities and towns who tends to the urban landscape and its inhabitants.
shortDescriptionHtml: A master of cities and towns who tends to the urban landscape and its inhabitants.

name: Death's Chosen
shortDescription: If chosen by his would-be undead master, a death's chosen serves as the master's living minion.
shortDescriptionHtml: If chosen by his would-be undead master, a death's chosen serves as the master's living minion.

name: Dirgesinger
shortDescription: Dirgesingers voice melodies not of celebration and joy, but of sorrow and grief.
shortDescriptionHtml: Dirgesingers voice melodies not of celebration and joy, but of sorrow and grief.

name: Ephemeral Exemplar
shortDescription: Ephemeral exemplars are paragons of incorporealness.
shortDescriptionHtml: Ephemeral exemplars are paragons of incorporealness.

name: Totem Rager
shortDescription: The totem rager embodies the wrath of nature in its most bestial form.
shortDescriptionHtml: The totem rager embodies the wrath of nature in its most bestial form.

name: Battle Maiden
shortDescription: Battle maidens are the stuff of wonder and legend, an order of mounted female samurai whose swift, fearless attacks are renowned throughout the world. They have a supernatural bond with their mounts, an intense spiritual connection similar to the bond between a paladin and her mount. Battle maidens maintain a tradition of martial prowess tempered by spiritual purity. Their spirits burn with pure devotion; they are unquestionably loyal, eternally dedicated, and above worldly desires.

name: Cognition Thief
shortDescription: A cognition thief's subtle ability to worm her way into a target's very consciousness makes her the ultimate secret agent.
shortDescriptionHtml: A cognition thief's subtle ability to worm her way into a target's very consciousness makes her the ultimate secret agent.

name: Harper Paragon
shortDescription: A Harper paragon actively promotes the welfare of other creatures while preventing evil forces from preying on innocents.
shortDescriptionHtml: A Harper paragon actively promotes the welfare of other creatures while preventing evil forces from preying on innocents.

name: Justiciar of Tyr
shortDescription: Justiciars are the very elite of Tyr's mortal servants, and they act as living embodiments of their god's portfolio.
shortDescriptionHtml: Justiciars are the very elite of Tyr's mortal servants, and they act as living embodiments of their god's portfolio.

name: Sand Shaper
shortDescription: Sand shapers are part prophet, part priest, part magician, and part assassin.
shortDescriptionHtml: Sand shapers are part prophet, part priest, part magician, and part assassin.

name: Scion of Tem-et-nu
shortDescription: Paladins of the temple of Tem-Et-Nu are sometimes selected to become the guardians of the rivers.
shortDescriptionHtml: Paladins of the temple of Tem-Et-Nu are sometimes selected to become the guardians of the rivers.

name: Great Sea Corsair
shortDescription: Adapt the dread pirate prestige class from Song and Silenceto create the Great Sea corsair prestige class.
shortDescriptionHtml: Adapt the dread pirate prestige class from Song and Silenceto create the Great Sea corsair prestige class.

name: Slaad Brooder
shortDescription: The brooder's sole purpose is to implant as many eggs pellets as he can to produce the widest possible range of progeny.
shortDescriptionHtml: The brooder's sole purpose is to implant as many eggs pellets as he can to produce the widest possible range of progeny.

name: Shadowblade
shortDescription: Shadowblades are martial combatants with an innate link to shadow.
shortDescriptionHtml: Shadowblades are martial combatants with an innate link to shadow.

name: Fiendbinder
shortDescription: A fiendbinder seeks to unlock the truenames of demons, devils, and other vile fiends, and use that knowledge to bind them to service.
shortDescriptionHtml: A fiendbinder seeks to unlock the truenames of demons, devils, and other vile fiends, and use that knowledge to bind them to service.

name: Prestige Bard
shortDescription: The prestige bard is a jack-of-all-trades, master of none.
shortDescriptionHtml: The prestige bard is a jack-of-all-trades, master of none.

name: Spell Scion
shortDescription: This prestige class is for characters who wield legendary weapons designed for use by arcane spellcasters, such as wizards, sorcerers, and sometimes bards.
shortDescriptionHtml: This prestige class is for characters who wield legendary weapons designed for use by arcane spellcasters, such as wizards, sorcerers, and sometimes bards.

name: Talontar Blightlord
shortDescription: Corrupt priests who revel in decay, the blightlords of Talona are feared and reviled throughout the Unapproachable East.
shortDescriptionHtml: Corrupt priests who revel in decay, the blightlords of Talona are feared and reviled throughout the Unapproachable East.

name: Deep Diviner
shortDescription: Deep diviners are intimates of the earth and all that it hides.
shortDescriptionHtml: Deep diviners are intimates of the earth and all that it hides.

name: Fangshields Druid
shortDescription: Druids of the Fangshields are the healers and nurturers of the group, acting on behalf of their more monstrous allies who cannot interact with "civilized" humanoids without causing fear and panic.
shortDescriptionHtml: Druids of the Fangshields are the healers and nurturers of the group, acting on behalf of their more monstrous allies who cannot interact with "civilized" humanoids without causing fear and panic.

name: Fangshields Ranger
shortDescription: Rangers of the Fangshields use their skills to patrol the wildlands, as well as to spy on and hunt evil creatures. However, some of the standard ranger class features are useless to creatures that lack hands to use manufactured weapons. Fangshields rangers learn other abilities to take advantage of their nonhumanoid anatomy, helping them become dangerous leaders of beasts and animals.

However, some of the standard ranger class features are useless to creatures that lack hands to use manufactured weapons. Fangshields rangers learn other abilities to take advantage of their nonhumanoid anatomy, helping them become dangerous leaders of beasts and animals.

name: Lion Legionnaire (Paladin)
shortDescription: The mighty wemic paladins of Nobanion are called the Legion of Lions; they are small in number but great in their bravery. Unlike most of Lord Firemane's wemic followers, they travel outside the Shaar in search of evil, and partly because of their efforts Nobanion's faith has attracted humanoid followers. Though most Lion Legionnaires are wemics, a small number are humanoids, and at least one lammasu is a member of this elite group. Rather than traditional paladin abilities, they develop powers relating to Nobanion's strengths and tactics.
