name: Wizard Variant
shortDescription: Some wizards trade their knowledge of magic and craft to improve their combat prowess.
shortDescriptionHtml: Some wizards trade their knowledge of magic and craft to improve their combat prowess.

name: Mountebank (Dragon Compendium)
shortDescription: A thief and trickster who draws on the power of an infernal pact with the dark powers.
shortDescriptionHtml: A thief and trickster who draws on the power of an infernal pact with the dark powers.

name: Monk of the Enabled Hand
shortDescription: This prestige class encompasses a fighting style that incorporates a variety of special unarmed attacks.
shortDescriptionHtml: This prestige class encompasses a fighting style that incorporates a variety of special unarmed attacks.

name: Deathwarden Chanter
shortDescription: The Deathwarden chanters are the most prestigious, respected, and mysterious members of the dwarven Deathwarden clan.
shortDescriptionHtml: The Deathwarden chanters are the most prestigious, respected, and mysterious members of the dwarven Deathwarden clan.

name: Olin Gisir
shortDescription: The Olin Gisiae are elite elf mages who have taken it upon themselves to guard dark secrets from the rest of the world
shortDescriptionHtml: The Olin Gisiae are elite elf mages who have taken it upon themselves to guard dark secrets from the rest of the world

name: War Wizard of Cormyr
shortDescription: The Cormyrean war wizards are some of the most respected battle-mages in Faer�n.
shortDescriptionHtml: The Cormyrean war wizards are some of the most respected battle-mages in Faer�n.

name: Forsaker
shortDescription: The forsaker rebels against the magic of the fantastic world around him.
shortDescriptionHtml: The forsaker rebels against the magic of the fantastic world around him.

name: Oozemaster
shortDescription: Oozemasters relate one-on-one with things that relate to nothing at all.
shortDescriptionHtml: Oozemasters relate one-on-one with things that relate to nothing at all.

name: Blade Dancer
shortDescription: To blade dancers, the sword is more than a weapon--it is an ally, a friend, a spirit companion. Viewing combat as art, a deadly dance, blade dancers are prone to singing in battle. Blade dancers tap powerful magical energy through a combination of martial prowess and magical study, gaining phenomenal acrobatic ability and the ability to enchant their blades in combat.

Viewing combat as art, a deadly dance, blade dancers are prone to singing in battle. Blade dancers tap powerful magical energy through a combination of martial prowess and magical study, gaining phenomenal acrobatic ability and the ability to enchant their blades in combat.

name: Mirumoto Niten Master
shortDescription: The Mirumoto school teaches a unique style of swordplay, rooted in this sense of duty.
shortDescriptionHtml: The Mirumoto school teaches a unique style of swordplay, rooted in this sense of duty.

name: Singh Rager
shortDescription: Singh ragers draw their furious strength from the noble lion (called a singh or singha in some societies). The singh ragers' fury never robs them of their discipline and control, which to many minds makes them only more terrifying. They are paragons of warrior virtue whose speed, strength, and courage are unrivaled.

name: Battlerager
shortDescription: Dwarven battleragers, or kuldjargh ("axe idiots"), are legendary berserker warriors who can enter a battle frenzy through ritualist singing.
shortDescriptionHtml: Dwarven battleragers, or kuldjargh ("axe idiots"), are legendary berserker warriors who can enter a battle frenzy through ritualist singing.

name: Orc Warlord
shortDescription: The orc warlord is a savage general of an unruly army, the leader of one of the deadly and all too common orc hordes that rampage down from the Spine of the World.
shortDescriptionHtml: The orc warlord is a savage general of an unruly army, the leader of one of the deadly and all too common orc hordes that rampage down from the Spine of the World.

name: Warrior Skald
shortDescription: Accompanying heroes of great renown, warrior skalds fight at their sides while composing the epics that will be told for centuries to come.
shortDescriptionHtml: Accompanying heroes of great renown, warrior skalds fight at their sides while composing the epics that will be told for centuries to come.

name: Goliath Liberator
shortDescription: Goliath liberators are experts at infiltrating giant dwellings, freeing the captives within, then exacting revenge on the giants while the freed goliaths escape.
shortDescriptionHtml: Goliath liberators are experts at infiltrating giant dwellings, freeing the captives within, then exacting revenge on the giants while the freed goliaths escape.

name: Runesmith
shortDescription: A runesmith has learned to harness the power of runes and can fling fireballsand other staple arcane spells even while encased in full plate armor.
shortDescriptionHtml: A runesmith has learned to harness the power of runes and can fling fireballsand other staple arcane spells even while encased in full plate armor.

name: Champion of Corellon Larethian
shortDescription: The champion of Corellon Larethian is a noble elf fighter, an elf knight or lord who can stand up to any orc or human warrior.
shortDescriptionHtml: The champion of Corellon Larethian is a noble elf fighter, an elf knight or lord who can stand up to any orc or human warrior.

name: Fang of Lolth
shortDescription: Fangs of Lolth undergo a transformation that both provides them power and changes them in ways they may not necessarily want.
shortDescriptionHtml: Fangs of Lolth undergo a transformation that both provides them power and changes them in ways they may not necessarily want.

name: Sharn Skymage
shortDescription: By studying the properties of the manifest zone in which Sharn is situated, learning its intricacies and methods for manipulating it, a spellcaster can improve her magical or natural ability to fly.
shortDescriptionHtml: By studying the properties of the manifest zone in which Sharn is situated, learning its intricacies and methods for manipulating it, a spellcaster can improve her magical or natural ability to fly.

name: Halruaan Elder
shortDescription: Halruaan elders are the epitomy of magic cast with panache, and their dazzling and unique displays of arcane force make them the most respected practitioners in the land.
shortDescriptionHtml: Halruaan elders are the epitomy of magic cast with panache, and their dazzling and unique displays of arcane force make them the most respected practitioners in the land.

name: Scourge Maiden
shortDescription: Scourge maidens are warrior-priestesses of Loviatar dedicated to pain and anguish.
shortDescriptionHtml: Scourge maidens are warrior-priestesses of Loviatar dedicated to pain and anguish.

name: Wavekeeper
shortDescription: Some druids feel the call of the primal deeps.
shortDescriptionHtml: Some druids feel the call of the primal deeps.

name: Scion of Dantalion
shortDescription: The scions believe that their destiny is to one day take up the crown of a long-forgotten human empire, bear the scepter of rulership, and rebuild the empire that could rival the stars.
shortDescriptionHtml: The scions believe that their destiny is to one day take up the crown of a long-forgotten human empire, bear the scepter of rulership, and rebuild the empire that could rival the stars.

name: Eternal Blade
shortDescription: An eternal blade is an elf who learns a variety of exotic fighting maneuvers with the aid and advice of the spirit of a mighty, ancient elf warrior.
shortDescriptionHtml: An eternal blade is an elf who learns a variety of exotic fighting maneuvers with the aid and advice of the spirit of a mighty, ancient elf warrior.

name: Aglarondan Griffonrider
shortDescription: Soaring above the Yuirwood and the coasts of Aglarond, the famed Aglarondan griffonriders are an elite force of aerial knights who serve the Simbul and defend their homeland against attack.
shortDescriptionHtml: Soaring above the Yuirwood and the coasts of Aglarond, the famed Aglarondan griffonriders are an elite force of aerial knights who serve the Simbul and defend their homeland against attack.

name: Nentyar Hunter
shortDescription: Sworn to defend the great forests and serve the Nentyarch, druidic ruler of the Circle of Leth, the Nentyar hunters roam the wild lands of the East, uprooting foul and evil things.
shortDescriptionHtml: Sworn to defend the great forests and serve the Nentyarch, druidic ruler of the Circle of Leth, the Nentyar hunters roam the wild lands of the East, uprooting foul and evil things.

name: Metamind
shortDescription:
Metaminds know that accumulating the most power in the shortest time is the key to psionic superiority. All metaminds strive for �power to burn��they are unconcerned with glamor or flashy behavior, but rather are singlemindedly determined to amass as much psychic power as possible. Someone who takes one or more levels of metamind is sometimes colloquially referred to as a �head� by other psionic characters. 

In game terms, a metamind is all about power points. Any character with some manifesting ability can become a metamind to enhance his or her mental strength�at the expense of discovering higher-level powers. Psions and wilders who need an extra edge for prolonged use of speci? c powers often take several levels of metamind.

name: Sorcerer/Wizard Variant
shortDescription: A sorcerer or wizard might desire a more durable companion to accompany him on excursions into the wilderness.
shortDescriptionHtml: A sorcerer or wizard might desire a more durable companion to accompany him on excursions into the wilderness.

name: Battle Dancer
shortDescription: An elegant warrior who pairs martial arts with graceful maneuvers in battle.
shortDescriptionHtml: An elegant warrior who pairs martial arts with graceful maneuvers in battle.

name: Ninja Spy
shortDescription: While some ninja are little more than assassins, true ninja spies are masters of exotic weapons, tools of stealth, and strange _ki_ powers. Ninja spies are members of a secretive ninja clan, the head of which holds absolute authority over the ninja's life and death. They are sworn to secrecy to protect the identities of their clan members and must never reveal that they are ninja. Despite their inclination to evil, ninja believe strongly in a code of honor, and risk offending their family (and earning a death sentence) if they break that code of honor.

They are sworn to secrecy to protect the identities of their clan members and must never reveal that they are ninja. Despite their inclination to evil, ninja believe strongly in a code of honor, and risk offending their family (and earning a death sentence) if they break that code of honor.

name: Warsling Sniper
shortDescription: The warsling sniper is an expert in the use of the weapon commonly associated with the halfling race.
shortDescriptionHtml: The warsling sniper is an expert in the use of the weapon commonly associated with the halfling race.

name: Lightbringer
shortDescription:
The Lightbringers are an expansive guild of undead hunters that readily hands out charter memberships to anyone who wants to stamp out undead. The Lightbringers have no central headquarters. Generally affiliated good-aligned temples in large cities set aside meeting rooms for those who sign the guild's charter. Pelor's temples are best known for hosting Lightbringers--believers and nonbelievers alike.

For more about guilds, see page 223 of _Dungeon Master's Guide II*.

*Symbol:* The Lightbringers' symbol is a stylized half-sun, half-moon disc.

*Credo:* "Suffer no false life."

name: Singer of Concordance
shortDescription: The Singers of Concordance are a small order of wandering draconic spiritual guides who begin as servitors of Io, the Ninefold Dragon, creator of all dragonkind.
shortDescriptionHtml: The Singers of Concordance are a small order of wandering draconic spiritual guides who begin as servitors of Io, the Ninefold Dragon, creator of all dragonkind.

name: Doomdreamer
shortDescription: Doomdreamers are the elite among the ranks of the cult of Tharizdun.
shortDescriptionHtml: Doomdreamers are the elite among the ranks of the cult of Tharizdun.

name: Skypledged
shortDescription: The skypledged represent a mystical tradition among the raptorans that hearkens back to an ancient pact with powerful lords of the Elemental Plane of Air.
shortDescriptionHtml: The skypledged represent a mystical tradition among the raptorans that hearkens back to an ancient pact with powerful lords of the Elemental Plane of Air.

name: Stormtalon
shortDescription: The stormtalons are consummate aerial warriors, using both their weapons and their razor-sharp foot talons to dive on their hapless foes.
shortDescriptionHtml: The stormtalons are consummate aerial warriors, using both their weapons and their razor-sharp foot talons to dive on their hapless foes.

name: Cannith Wand Adept
shortDescription: The Cannith wand adept is an artificer or other spellcaster who specializes in mastering wands.
shortDescriptionHtml: The Cannith wand adept is an artificer or other spellcaster who specializes in mastering wands.

name: Serpent Slayer
shortDescription: Some individuals devote their entire lives to thwarting the yuan-ti.
shortDescriptionHtml: Some individuals devote their entire lives to thwarting the yuan-ti.

name: Candle Caster
shortDescription: Also called "spell chandlers," these specialists fill their time fashioning candles, both for esthetics and for power.
shortDescriptionHtml: Also called "spell chandlers," these specialists fill their time fashioning candles, both for esthetics and for power.

name: Knight of the Sacred Seal
shortDescription: A knight of the sacred seal is never alone because she has formed a true partnership with a single vestige.
shortDescriptionHtml: A knight of the sacred seal is never alone because she has formed a true partnership with a single vestige.

name: Deepstone Sentinel
shortDescription: The Stone Dragon discipline traces its roots back to an ancient order of dwarves that used the power of the earth to enhance their combat style.
shortDescriptionHtml: The Stone Dragon discipline traces its roots back to an ancient order of dwarves that used the power of the earth to enhance their combat style.

name: Sea Mother Whip
shortDescription: Devout worshipers of Blibdoolpoolp who seek closer communion with the Sea Mother often gain additional abilities in the Sea Mother whip prestige class.
shortDescriptionHtml: Devout worshipers of Blibdoolpoolp who seek closer communion with the Sea Mother often gain additional abilities in the Sea Mother whip prestige class.

name: Red Falcon (Paladin)
shortDescription: Members of the Order of the Red Falcon serve the Red Knight and have earned fame in Tethyr for their heroics. They have a reputation for being excellent military tacticians, and even their followers are a cut above the norm.
shortDescriptionHtml: Members of the Order of the Red Falcon serve the Red Knight and have earned fame in Tethyr for their heroics. They have a reputation for being excellent military tacticians, and even their followers are a cut above the norm.

name: Monk Variant: Fighting Styles
shortDescription: In literature and lore, the combat styles and aptitudes of a monk depend greatly on where (or by whom) she was trained.
shortDescriptionHtml: In literature and lore, the combat styles and aptitudes of a monk depend greatly on where (or by whom) she was trained.

name: Moon Guardian
shortDescription: When a werewolf or other evil lycanthrope passes on the curse of lycanthropy, the victim must either find a cure quickly or succumb slowly to the ravening evil of a bestial nature. But good or neutral divine spellcasters who have strong connections to their deities or to the divine powers they choose to represent can sometimes use their divine connections to stave off the slide into evil. Those who succeed are known as moon guardians.

name: Shaper of Form
shortDescription: Initiates into this rare magical tradition learn from mysterious entities to reshape objects with incredible ease.
shortDescriptionHtml: Initiates into this rare magical tradition learn from mysterious entities to reshape objects with incredible ease.

name: Guild Thief
shortDescription: Guild thieves are thieves who operate in urban areas as part of an organized thieves' guild.
shortDescriptionHtml: Guild thieves are thieves who operate in urban areas as part of an organized thieves' guild.

name: Divine Seeker
shortDescription: The divine seeker infiltrates dangerous places to rescue prisoners, reclaim stolen relics, or eliminate enemy leaders.
shortDescriptionHtml: The divine seeker infiltrates dangerous places to rescue prisoners, reclaim stolen relics, or eliminate enemy leaders.

name: War Weaver
shortDescription: By weaving together strands of pure arcane power, the war weaver becomes a force to be reckoned with on the battlefield.
shortDescriptionHtml: By weaving together strands of pure arcane power, the war weaver becomes a force to be reckoned with on the battlefield.

name: Cultist of the Shattered Peak
shortDescription:
"The pride of wizards and arcanists nearly doomed Faerun once. Never again"
                                                                                      -Khemal Serist, Cultist of the Shattered Peak

The Cult of the Shattered Peak is a highly secretive society whose members are all direct descendants of the Netherese. Cult cells are scattered all across Faerun, but the majority are concentrated within and around the former boundaries of Netheril. Many cultists live among the Bedine tribes of the Anauroch and the folk of the North and tun. Smaller cells operate across the Western Heartlands, monitoring Netherese ruins both known and unknown.
   Most of the tales about secret netherese cults depict their members as power-mad wizards bent on raising the Empire of Magic once again, or exploiting its secrets for personal gain. But the Cult of the Shattered Peak bears no resemblance to the cults in these stories, since its membership includes not a single arcane spellcaster. The members of this cult recall the hubris of Netheril and its citizenz' oppression of the those they viewed as "lesser races," and they seek to ensure that the ways of old Netheril remain dead and buried. To that end, they employ a variety of tactics-spreading misinformation, discrediting scholars who get too close to resurrecting some aspect of Netherese life, and even outright assassination, if necessary. Their methods may be ruthless at times, but the cultists firmly believe that they are working toward the greater good

shortDescription: Masters of radiance channel the pure, undiluted power of the sun.
shortDescriptionHtml: Masters of radiance channel the pure, undiluted power of the sun.

name: Fleshwarper
shortDescription: The fleshwarper finds no greater canvas than flesh itself.
shortDescriptionHtml: The fleshwarper finds no greater canvas than flesh itself.

name: Gnome Artificer
shortDescription: Gnome artificers dabble in technology to create fantastic devices, delving into shadow magic when their mundane equipment is insufficient for the task.
shortDescriptionHtml: Gnome artificers dabble in technology to create fantastic devices, delving into shadow magic when their mundane equipment is insufficient for the task.

name: Incantatrix
shortDescription: The incantatrixes are the practitioners of metamagic in Faer�n, studying spells that affect other spells and having a fondness for magic that thwarts extraplanar beings.
shortDescriptionHtml: The incantatrixes are the practitioners of metamagic in Faer�n, studying spells that affect other spells and having a fondness for magic that thwarts extraplanar beings.

name: Vigilant Sentinel of Aerenal
shortDescription: Part spy, part assassin, and completely loyal to the Sibling Kings and Aerenal's undying rulers, the sentinels roam across Eberron.
shortDescriptionHtml: Part spy, part assassin, and completely loyal to the Sibling Kings and Aerenal's undying rulers, the sentinels roam across Eberron.

name: Ironsoul Forgemaster
shortDescription: Only the ironsoul forgemaster can craft a weapon that combines these arts with the shaping of soul essence.
shortDescriptionHtml: Only the ironsoul forgemaster can craft a weapon that combines these arts with the shaping of soul essence.

name: Sapphire Hierarch
shortDescription: The elite members of an order of priests of law defend the temple, contemplate the mysteries of the Sapphire Eidolon, and seek to fulfill its single command by perfecting themselves and bringing order out of chaos wherever they find it.
shortDescriptionHtml: The elite members of an order of priests of law defend the temple, contemplate the mysteries of the Sapphire Eidolon, and seek to fulfill its single command by perfecting themselves and bringing order out of chaos wherever they find it.

name: Hexer
shortDescription: The hexer uses the power of his gaze.
shortDescriptionHtml: The hexer uses the power of his gaze.

name: Tamer of Beasts
shortDescription: Through magic and his overwhelming concern for his charges, the tamer of beasts can make them tougher and more intelligent.
shortDescriptionHtml: Through magic and his overwhelming concern for his charges, the tamer of beasts can make them tougher and more intelligent.

name: Watch Detective
shortDescription: The watch detective specializes in solving mysteries.

name: Mantis Mercenary
shortDescription: Mantis mercenaries make use of peasant weapons and a rolling motion.
shortDescriptionHtml: Mantis mercenaries make use of peasant weapons and a rolling motion.

name: Shapeshifter
shortDescription: Shapeshifters are masters of these transforming powers, whose natural forms eventually become as fluid as water.
shortDescriptionHtml: Shapeshifters are masters of these transforming powers, whose natural forms eventually become as fluid as water.

name: Hammer of Moradin
shortDescription: An elite order of warrior-priests stands ready to defend the dwarven people against the onslaught of fell giants, dark elves, and goblinoids.
shortDescriptionHtml: An elite order of warrior-priests stands ready to defend the dwarven people against the onslaught of fell giants, dark elves, and goblinoids.

name: Slime Lord
shortDescription: Slime lords, the most favored of Ghaunadar's servants, are not clerics; they are spies and infiltrators who can change their shapes in order to move unnoticed among members of any race.
shortDescriptionHtml: Slime lords, the most favored of Ghaunadar's servants, are not clerics; they are spies and infiltrators who can change their shapes in order to move unnoticed among members of any race.

name: Reachrunner
shortDescription: Known for their mastery of the untamed world, some shifters rise above others in woodslore, physical ability, and stamina to claim the revered mantle of the reachrunner -- the greatest of shifter trackers and scouts.
shortDescriptionHtml: Known for their mastery of the untamed world, some shifters rise above others in woodslore, physical ability, and stamina to claim the revered mantle of the reachrunner — the greatest of shifter trackers and scouts.

name: Cragtop Archer
shortDescription: Cragtop archers train their eyes and minds to find target at great distances, and to quickly compensate for wind, movement, and other factors that affect shots of such difficulty.
shortDescriptionHtml: Cragtop archers train their eyes and minds to find target at great distances, and to quickly compensate for wind, movement, and other factors that affect shots of such difficulty.

name: Stonespeaker Guardian
shortDescription: The stonespeaker guardian taps into the divine power of the earth itself to defend her fellow stonespeakers, as well as other goliaths and friendly races, from their enemies.
shortDescriptionHtml: The stonespeaker guardian taps into the divine power of the earth itself to defend her fellow stonespeakers, as well as other goliaths and friendly races, from their enemies.

name: Great Rift Deep Defender
shortDescription: The Great Rift deep defender has a keen understanding of the importance of making a stand.
shortDescriptionHtml: The Great Rift deep defender has a keen understanding of the importance of making a stand.

name: Hordebreaker
shortDescription: The hordebreaker is a person who makes destroying the horde threat the perfect engine of orc destruction.
shortDescriptionHtml: The hordebreaker is a person who makes destroying the horde threat the perfect engine of orc destruction.

name: Emancipated Spawn
shortDescription: Those spawn of undead who find themselves free of their masters can begin to recall their former lives and a measure of redemption.
shortDescriptionHtml: Those spawn of undead who find themselves free of their masters can begin to recall their former lives and a measure of redemption.

name: Anima Mage
shortDescription: Anima mages see vestiges as mere tools, no different from spell component pouches or a wand of fireball.
shortDescriptionHtml: Anima mages see vestiges as mere tools, no different from spell component pouches or a wand of fireball.

name: Brimstone Speaker
shortDescription: Brimstone speakers regard the secret language of truenames as nothing less than a gift from the gods.
shortDescriptionHtml: Brimstone speakers regard the secret language of truenames as nothing less than a gift from the gods.

name: Yathchol Webrider
shortDescription: With their intimate understanding of webspinning and their familiarity with the Overweb, Yathchol webriders can move about the Underdark as they choose.
shortDescriptionHtml: With their intimate understanding of webspinning and their familiarity with the Overweb, Yathchol webriders can move about the Underdark as they choose.

name: Golden Cup (Paladin)
shortDescription: Paladins who are members of the Order of the Golden Cup serve Ilmater and have dedicated themselves to healing the sick and weak and protecting the innocent. Peaceful counterparts to the Companions of the Noble Heart (see page 100), they don't shy away from combating evil, but they allow their companions to actively hunt it down while they focus on protecting those who can't protect themselves.
shortDescriptionHtml: Paladins who are members of the Order of the Golden Cup serve Ilmater and have dedicated themselves to healing the sick and weak and protecting the innocent. Peaceful counterparts to the Companions of the Noble Heart (see page 100), they don't shy away from combating evil, but they allow their companions to actively hunt it down while they focus on protecting those who can't protect themselves.

name: Fighter Variant
shortDescription: Some fighters prefer stealth and cunning over martial skill. This variant can also be combined with the thug variant described earlier in this chapter.
shortDescriptionHtml: Some fighters prefer stealth and cunning over martial skill. This variant can also be combined with the thug variant described earlier in this chapter.

name: Rogue Variant
shortDescription: The rogue who favors martial training over stealth and cunning can profit if she chooses her fights carefully.
shortDescriptionHtml: The rogue who favors martial training over stealth and cunning can profit if she chooses her fights carefully.

name: Blessed of Gruumsh
shortDescription: This champion of orc-kind makes a formidable foe or, in the case of a half-orc PC, a valued ally.
shortDescriptionHtml: This champion of orc-kind makes a formidable foe or, in the case of a half-orc PC, a valued ally.

name: Osteomancer
shortDescription: This spellcaster learns to weave magic that allows him to control the structure of bones, whether his own or his enemies'.
shortDescriptionHtml: This spellcaster learns to weave magic that allows him to control the structure of bones, whether his own or his enemies'.

name: Tainted Scholar
shortDescription: No secret is barred from the tainted scholar's grasp, and if such forbidden knowledge comes at the cost of his soul, he's willing to pay that price.
shortDescriptionHtml: No secret is barred from the tainted scholar's grasp, and if such forbidden knowledge comes at the cost of his soul, he's willing to pay that price.

name: Darkmask
shortDescription: Darkmasks strike a balance between their faith and their skills at stealth.
shortDescriptionHtml: Darkmasks strike a balance between their faith and their skills at stealth.

name: Lurking Terror
shortDescription: Lurking terrors are the quintessential hunting undead, displaying great prowess with their special abilities and amazing powers of stealth.
shortDescriptionHtml: Lurking terrors are the quintessential hunting undead, displaying great prowess with their special abilities and amazing powers of stealth.

name: Pale Master
shortDescription: Arcane casters can become pale masters, who draw on necromantic lore that provides a macabre power all its own.
shortDescriptionHtml: Arcane casters can become pale masters, who draw on necromantic lore that provides a macabre power all its own.

name: Abolisher
shortDescription:
I have tracked the foul illithid cult for many months now, have waded through the brainless dead they leave in their wake and the empty settlements from which they have recruited their thralls. Yet each time, they leave behind clues to their weaknesses and hints to their goals, and soon indeed I shall be ready to end their lives in the only way they deserve. When I am done, nothing shall remain, not even the memory of their taint. They shall not haunt the campfie tales of children. It shall be as if they never were. 
_Aurah Lirilian, Circle of the True_

The abolisher is more than merely a devoted servant of the natural world. She is a crusader against that which taints, usurps, and replaces the ordered nature of things with alien desires and monstrous needs. She opposes aberrations with all her will and might in a constant battle to preserve what is pure in nature from that which lurks beyond the rim of sanity.

name: War Hulk
shortDescription: The war hulk is a creature of great size and talent who is specifically trained to shock and awe opposing massed troops.
shortDescriptionHtml: The war hulk is a creature of great size and talent who is specifically trained to shock and awe opposing massed troops.

name: Witchborn Binder
shortDescription: Elite agents within the Vigilant Servants, a society whose members make it their business to frustrate the plans of the witchborn, witchborn binders are incarnum-wielding mage-hunters who can use the power of soul energy to create shields, traps, and shackles.
shortDescriptionHtml: Elite agents within the Vigilant Servants, a society whose members make it their business to frustrate the plans of the witchborn, witchborn binders are incarnum-wielding mage-hunters who can use the power of soul energy to create shields, traps, and shackles.

name: Planar Champion
shortDescription: The planar champion moves between the planes, always driven to battle.
shortDescriptionHtml: The planar champion moves between the planes, always driven to battle.

name: Akodo Champion
shortDescription: Akodo champions are the leaders of the mighty army of the Lion clan.
shortDescriptionHtml: Akodo champions are the leaders of the mighty army of the Lion clan.

name: Maiden of Pain
shortDescription: Loviatar's most dedicated servants, the maidens of pain, are depraved women who literally make pain their meat and drink.
shortDescriptionHtml: Loviatar's most dedicated servants, the maidens of pain, are depraved women who literally make pain their meat and drink.

name: Doomlord
shortDescription: The doomlord's life holds the greatest appeal for fighters and barbarians who enjoy smashing and destroying.
shortDescriptionHtml: The doomlord's life holds the greatest appeal for fighters and barbarians who enjoy smashing and destroying.

name: Spellsinger
shortDescription: Spellsingers are rare practitioners of an ancient elven bardic tradition.
shortDescriptionHtml: Spellsingers are rare practitioners of an ancient elven bardic tradition.

name: Blade Bravo
shortDescription: Blade bravos are gnomes who learn the ways of the rapier.
shortDescriptionHtml: Blade bravos are gnomes who learn the ways of the rapier.

name: Divine Prankster
shortDescription: These gnomes embrace Garl's methods of teaching through harmless object lessons and dedicate their lives to acting as his agents in the world.
shortDescriptionHtml: These gnomes embrace Garl's methods of teaching through harmless object lessons and dedicate their lives to acting as his agents in the world.

name: Stonedeath Assassin
shortDescription: Most stonedeath assassins are hobgoblin rogues or rangers, but bugbears and even exceptional goblins have been known to undertake stonedeath training and learn the ways of infiltrating dwarf strongholds by disarming traps, weakening gates, and assassinating dwarf leaders.
shortDescriptionHtml: Most stonedeath assassins are hobgoblin rogues or rangers, but bugbears and even exceptional goblins have been known to undertake stonedeath training and learn the ways of infiltrating dwarf strongholds by disarming traps, weakening gates, and assassinating dwarf leaders.

name: Ruathar
shortDescription: Also known as "elf-friend" or "star-friend," a ruathar is a person of some other race who has earned the special friendship of the elven folk.
shortDescriptionHtml: Also known as "elf-friend" or "star-friend," a ruathar is a person of some other race who has earned the special friendship of the elven folk.

name: Royal Explorer
shortDescription: Some monarchs sponser crack teams of explorers.
shortDescriptionHtml: Some monarchs sponser crack teams of explorers.

name: Fist of Hextor
shortDescription: Fists of Hextor are templars sworn to the service of their unforgiving master.
shortDescriptionHtml: Fists of Hextor are templars sworn to the service of their unforgiving master.

name: Master of Chains
shortDescription: The master of chains is a combatant specializing in the use of chains -- specifically the spiked chain -- as a weapon.
shortDescriptionHtml: The master of chains is a combatant specializing in the use of chains — specifically the spiked chain — as a weapon.

name: Hand of the Adama
shortDescription: The hand of the Adama is a benign leader, judge and jury, and protector of the common folk all rolled into one.
shortDescriptionHtml: The hand of the Adama is a benign leader, judge and jury, and protector of the common folk all rolled into one.

name: Maquar Crusader
shortDescription: A Maquar crusader follows a strict code of conduct that not only limits what he can own or where he can live, but also limits the ways in which merchants can influence him.
shortDescriptionHtml: A Maquar crusader follows a strict code of conduct that not only limits what he can own or where he can live, but also limits the ways in which merchants can influence him.

name: Siren
shortDescription: A harpy siren is an artist who constantly seeks to expand and improve upon her innate sonic ability.
shortDescriptionHtml: A harpy siren is an artist who constantly seeks to expand and improve upon her innate sonic ability.

name: Swift Scion
shortDescription: This prestige class is for those who wield legendary weapons that make use of or improve the wielder's stealth, speed, or dexterity (in the general sense).
shortDescriptionHtml: This prestige class is for those who wield legendary weapons that make use of or improve the wielder's stealth, speed, or dexterity (in the general sense).

name: Nar Demonbinder
shortDescription: Master of the black art of demon summoning, the Nar demonbinder keeps alive the sinister traditions of the old Empire of Narfell.
shortDescriptionHtml: Master of the black art of demon summoning, the Nar demonbinder keeps alive the sinister traditions of the old Empire of Narfell.

name: Telflammar Shadowlord
shortDescription: Above all the criminals of the Shadowmasters of Telflamm stand the Telflammar shadowlords,the secret captains of iniquity who demand unquestioned obedience from their numerous minions.
shortDescriptionHtml: Above all the criminals of the Shadowmasters of Telflamm stand the Telflammar shadowlords,the secret captains of iniquity who demand unquestioned obedience from their numerous minions.

name: Arachnomancer
shortDescription: Many creatures of the Underdark are drawn to the power of the spider and that of the master of spiders -- the arachnomancer.
shortDescriptionHtml: Many creatures of the Underdark are drawn to the power of the spider and that of the master of spiders — the arachnomancer.

name: Thrallherd
shortDescription:
Thrallherds manipulate the minds of others as if they were clay in the hands of a sculptor. Some creatures are more susceptible than others to the thrallherd�s unconscious, but continual, call to service. And so they come, eager to be led, happy to follow, and completely under the thrallherd�s control. In this way, thrallherds keep a minor menagerie of enthralled servants that are anxious to do their will.

This class doesn�t offer much for those who enjoy doing things themselves. Because thrallherds delegate most tasks, including their own physical defense, psions (especially telepaths) are most apt to follow this path.

name: Darksong Knight (Fighter)
shortDescription: The Darksong Knights are elite soldiers of Eilistraee who further her many causes and hunt the yochlol, the demonic servants of the Spider Queen. They develop an intricate, dancelike style of swordplay and special powers to defeat their demonic enemies.
shortDescriptionHtml: The Darksong Knights are elite soldiers of Eilistraee who further her many causes and hunt the yochlol, the demonic servants of the Spider Queen. They develop an intricate, dancelike style of swordplay and special powers to defeat their demonic enemies.

name: Dukar
shortDescription: These wizards of a dwindling order protect the tenuous peace under the Sea of Fallen Stars, working quietly and secretly to achieve their goals and rebuild their numbers. Many of their powers stem from living coral implanted under the skin of their hands.
shortDescriptionHtml: These wizards of a dwindling order protect the tenuous peace under the Sea of Fallen Stars, working quietly and secretly to achieve their goals and rebuild their numbers. Many of their powers stem from living coral implanted under the skin of their hands.

name: Ruby Rose Knight (Paladin)
shortDescription: Members of Sune's order of paladins, the Sisters and Brothers of the Ruby Rose, are known for their charm, beauty, and aversion to ugliness and evil. They use the power of love to destroy evil and hideous things, and they draw strength from their many romances.
shortDescriptionHtml: Members of Sune's order of paladins, the Sisters and Brothers of the Ruby Rose, are known for their charm, beauty, and aversion to ugliness and evil. They use the power of love to destroy evil and hideous things, and they draw strength from their many romances.

name: Wary Swordknight (Paladin)
shortDescription: Members of Arvoreen's Marchers kept halfl ing villages safe during Tethyr's Interregnum; the Wary Swordknights are the paladins of the order, and are known for their martial prowess and vigilant nature.
shortDescriptionHtml: Members of Arvoreen's Marchers kept halfl ing villages safe during Tethyr's Interregnum; the Wary Swordknights are the paladins of the order, and are known for their martial prowess and vigilant nature.

name: Bard Variant
shortDescription: A rare bard might display a special link to nature and the mysterious world of the fey. Such characters tend to be more aloof and less inspiring than standard bards.
shortDescriptionHtml: A rare bard might display a special link to nature and the mysterious world of the fey. Such characters tend to be more aloof and less inspiring than standard bards.

name: Cerebrex
shortDescription: The cerebrex's arcane talents grant him the ability to develop his vast intellect and peer into others' minds to rob them of their spells.
shortDescriptionHtml: The cerebrex's arcane talents grant him the ability to develop his vast intellect and peer into others' minds to rob them of their spells.

name: Runecaster
shortDescription: Those that choose to master the ability to create runes of power are runecasters.
shortDescriptionHtml: Those that choose to master the ability to create runes of power are runecasters.

name: Corrupt Avenger
shortDescription: A corrupt avenger accepts any cost to have his vengeance, even to the forfeit of his very soul.
shortDescriptionHtml: A corrupt avenger accepts any cost to have his vengeance, even to the forfeit of his very soul.

name: Spur Lord
shortDescription: The Spur Lords are elite zealots of the church, wielding the dark power of Cyric and commanding the attention of even the most fanatical clerics.
shortDescriptionHtml: The Spur Lords are elite zealots of the church, wielding the dark power of Cyric and commanding the attention of even the most fanatical clerics.

name: Darkrunner
shortDescription:
See that? The circular patch of ground that�s all muddy and smooth, when all the stone around it is rough and solid? One of them gibbering mouthers jumped someone here, and recently. Hand me that shovel. Sometimes they leave their victims buried in the mud they make, and they don�t take the poor fool�s gear when they�re done.
_Jasper Ringlerock of the Darkrunner Guild_

Darkrunners devote their lives to traveling the haunted underground depths. Some hire out their services as guides to those who wish to navigate the lightless ways, while others are lone wolves who simply wish to explore the deepest reaches of this wondrous and dangerous realm. They understand the lay of the subterranean world like no other, and use its terrain and features to great advantage in combat.

name: Harper Priest
shortDescription: Some Harpers choose to pursue a closer relationship to the deities who inspired the creation of the Harpers.
shortDescriptionHtml: Some Harpers choose to pursue a closer relationship to the deities who inspired the creation of the Harpers.

name: Mystic Wanderer
shortDescription: Mystic wanderers are divine spellcasters who eschew normal church hierarchies and instead embrace freedom, wanderlust, and independence.
shortDescriptionHtml: Mystic wanderers are divine spellcasters who eschew normal church hierarchies and instead embrace freedom, wanderlust, and independence.

name: Alchemist Savant
shortDescription: The alchemist savant excels in the capacity to break down the normal barriers that lie between alchemy and magic, between potion and alchemical fluid, between science and art.
shortDescriptionHtml: The alchemist savant excels in the capacity to break down the normal barriers that lie between alchemy and magic, between potion and alchemical fluid, between science and art.

name: Renegade Mastermaker
shortDescription: A renegade mastermaker applies the secrets of warforged creation methods to his own body, slowly replacing parts of his body with mechanical augmentations.
shortDescriptionHtml: A renegade mastermaker applies the secrets of warforged creation methods to his own body, slowly replacing parts of his body with mechanical augmentations.

name: Incandescent Champion
shortDescription: The incandescent champion seeks to dispense with barriers and obstacles both tangible and intangible so that she can touch the cosmic soul with her unveiled body, mind, and spirit.
shortDescriptionHtml: The incandescent champion seeks to dispense with barriers and obstacles both tangible and intangible so that she can touch the cosmic soul with her unveiled body, mind, and spirit.

name: Soulcaster
shortDescription: Soulcasters excel at incorporating soul energy into their magic.
shortDescriptionHtml: Soulcasters excel at incorporating soul energy into their magic.

name: Umbral Disciple
shortDescription: The umbral disciple is a student of shadow in both a literal and a metaphysical sense.
shortDescriptionHtml: The umbral disciple is a student of shadow in both a literal and a metaphysical sense.

name: Planeshifter
shortDescription: The planeshifter is a magical scholar and expert in planar travel, and through arcane research develops not only the ability to sense planar portals, but also the ability to create his own demiplane.
shortDescriptionHtml: The planeshifter is a magical scholar and expert in planar travel, and through arcane research develops not only the ability to sense planar portals, but also the ability to create his own demiplane.

name: Bane of Infidels
shortDescription: The bane of infidels is the leader of a xenophobic tribe.
shortDescriptionHtml: The bane of infidels is the leader of a xenophobic tribe.

name: Shifter
shortDescription: The shifter has no form that she calls her own.
shortDescriptionHtml: The shifter has no form that she calls her own.

name: Shadow Thief of Amn
shortDescription: A shadow thief of Amn knows only her own minions, her coworkers, and her superior.
shortDescriptionHtml: A shadow thief of Amn knows only her own minions, her coworkers, and her superior.

name: Shadow Sentinel
shortDescription: Shadow sentinels are elite illumian warriors who protect their people from githyanki raiders, demonic invastions, and hordes of barely imaginable monsters from the Plane of Shadow.
shortDescriptionHtml: Shadow sentinels are elite illumian warriors who protect their people from githyanki raiders, demonic invastions, and hordes of barely imaginable monsters from the Plane of Shadow.

name: Reforged
shortDescription: The reforged represents the realized ideal of the warforged's living aspects.
shortDescriptionHtml: The reforged represents the realized ideal of the warforged's living aspects.

name: Peregrine Runner
shortDescription: When goliaths need to send a message to another tribe, they send an elite, fleet-of-foot warrior known as a peregrine runner.
shortDescriptionHtml: When goliaths need to send a message to another tribe, they send an elite, fleet-of-foot warrior known as a peregrine runner.

name: Wildrunner
shortDescription: Wildrunners give themselves almost wholly to nature, seeking to return to their untamed roots and eventually become fey creatures.
shortDescriptionHtml: Wildrunners give themselves almost wholly to nature, seeking to return to their untamed roots and eventually become fey creatures.

name: Ashworm Dragoon
shortDescription: Ashworm dragoons have formed a bond with a single ashworm that is so strong that it is almost an extension of their wills.
shortDescriptionHtml: Ashworm dragoons have formed a bond with a single ashworm that is so strong that it is almost an extension of their wills.

name: Gladiator
shortDescription: Rich or poor, all gladiators face death whenever they step into the arena.
shortDescriptionHtml: Rich or poor, all gladiators face death whenever they step into the arena.

name: Ninja of the Crescent Moon
shortDescription: The Ninja of the Crescent Moon is a mercenary clan whose members engage in sabotage and other covert missions for an outlandish fee.
shortDescriptionHtml: The Ninja of the Crescent Moon is a mercenary clan whose members engage in sabotage and other covert missions for an outlandish fee.

name: Peerless Archer
shortDescription: The peerless archer devotes her life to perfecting her skill with the bow.
shortDescriptionHtml: The peerless archer devotes her life to perfecting her skill with the bow.

name: Scaled Horror
shortDescription: Scaled horrors are elite amphibious soldiers.
shortDescriptionHtml: Scaled horrors are elite amphibious soldiers.

name: Bloodclaw Master
shortDescription: A bloodclaw master embraces the animal within to a degree that it becomes external, partially transforming him into the beast from which the discipline was inspired.
shortDescriptionHtml: A bloodclaw master embraces the animal within to a degree that it becomes external, partially transforming him into the beast from which the discipline was inspired.

name: Elocater
shortDescription:
Elocaters are renowned for their agile combat stratagems, using their knowledge of motion and space to set themselves up for quick attacks against slower opponents. Elocaters excel on the ?eld of battle, slipping in and out of harm�s way like a violent wind, surprising foes with their sudden opportunistic attacks and then darting away before foes are able to retaliate. Elocaters are also known for �getting there,� wherever �there� is. They are swift travelers, pro?cient in simple scouting or in gaining entrance into locked and trapped treasure vaults. 

Psychic warriors seem most attracted to the elocater class, though combat-oriented wilders and psions of the kineticist and nomad disciplines also ?nd elocater class features of interest.

name: War Mind
shortDescription:
War minds are expert fighters who claim to possess unequaled knowledge in the art of war. Through a combination of inner contemplation and external study of an ancient text called the Talariic Codex, war minds grow in their craft of arms and war. Those who study the Talariic Codex learn several tenets, collectively known as chains of war. As a war mind masters one chain, he opens himself to learn the next chain in the series, should he desire to continue to bend his mind to the intensive studies required to advance in this class.

Soulknives and psychic warriors are most likely to take up study of the Talariic Codex, though finding a copy of the ancient text may prove a task all its own. Even those who initially begin their careers as fighters or barbarians may pick up some training in a psionic class for the express purpose of eventually being able to study as a war mind.

name: Dungeon Lord
shortDescription:
Some creatures become so familiar with their hoome that they can navigate it with their eyes closed and are attuned to the smallest change. Intruders tread on dangerous ground, facing a foe wiht a significant edge. When the home is a dungeon, teh result is a dungeon lord. Undisputed masters of their environment, dungeon lords possess a supernatural awareness of their home and a fierce desire to crush those who dare to invade it. 

Although the entry requirements for hte dungeon lord prestige class are relatively simple, aspirants must have complete familiarity with one entire, specific dungeon environment. This requirement excludes most adventurers from the class and opens it up to creatures that actually live in the dungeon. Although the abilities of a dungeon lord do not add to a creature's spellcasting progression or other typical class features, they grant impressive powers in relation to dungeons, making this prestige class ideal for a number of monsters.

name: Claw of the Sun and the Ankh (Paladin)
shortDescription: The first Mulhorandi order of paladins to worship a god other than Osiris, the Claw of the Sun and the Ankh serves Horus-Re. Its fearless and fanatical soldiers are dedicated to energetically pursing the evil minions of Set, relentlessly destroying them and their foul plans whenever they are found.

Its fearless and fanatical soldiers are dedicated to energetically pursing the evil minions of Set, relentlessly destroying them and their foul plans whenever they are found.

name: Shooting Star (Ranger)
shortDescription: Rangers of the Order of the Shooting Star (see Knights of the Mystic Fire, page 102) serve Mystra by scouting, spying, and dealing with fiends and monstrosities created by magical experimentation.
shortDescriptionHtml: Rangers of the Order of the Shooting Star (see Knights of the Mystic Fire, page 102) serve Mystra by scouting, spying, and dealing with fiends and monstrosities created by magical experimentation.

name: Savant
shortDescription:
A scholar and researcher who studies everything from armed fighting to divine and arcane
magic.
shortDescriptionHtml:
A scholar and researcher who studies everything from armed fighting to divine and arcane
magic.

name: Force Missile Mage
shortDescription: Mages of this class focus on magic missile to push that spell beyond its normal limits.
shortDescriptionHtml: Mages of this class focus on magic missile to push that spell beyond its normal limits.

name: Keeper of the Cerulean Sign
shortDescription: The Cerulean Sign is an ancient rune of power, created untold eons ago by a race or deity long since vanished; now it has keepers.
shortDescriptionHtml: The Cerulean Sign is an ancient rune of power, created untold eons ago by a race or deity long since vanished; now it has keepers.

name: Harper Mage
shortDescription: The Harper mage has two principal responsibilities: They aid the Harpers with spells and arcane knowledge, and they study, record, and pass on ancient lore.
shortDescriptionHtml: The Harper mage has two principal responsibilities: They aid the Harpers with spells and arcane knowledge, and they study, record, and pass on ancient lore.

name: Impure Prince
shortDescription: Of those who make it their special mission to rid the world of aberrations and their masters, only impure princes can claim the distinction of using daelkyr-inspired corruptions and symbionts as their most effective tool in aberration cleansing.
shortDescriptionHtml: Of those who make it their special mission to rid the world of aberrations and their masters, only impure princes can claim the distinction of using daelkyr-inspired corruptions and symbionts as their most effective tool in aberration cleansing.

name: Quori Mindhunter
shortDescription: The quori mindhunter has a single mission: to hunt down and destroy the quori spirits that corrupt humanity, and the possessed Inspired that further the aims of the Dreaming Dark.
shortDescriptionHtml: The quori mindhunter has a single mission: to hunt down and destroy the quori spirits that corrupt humanity, and the possessed Inspired that further the aims of the Dreaming Dark.

name: Bayushi Deceiver
shortDescription: The Bayushi are charged with the dirtiest work in the empire.
shortDescriptionHtml: The Bayushi are charged with the dirtiest work in the empire.

name: Kishi Charger
shortDescription: Kishi chargers are cavalry soldiers trained to make the greatest possible use of a horse's speed and a rider's agility. Kishi chargers share a special bond with their mounts and are capable of truly devastating attacks when charging.
shortDescriptionHtml: Kishi chargers are cavalry soldiers trained to make the greatest possible use of a horse's speed and a rider's agility. Kishi chargers share a special bond with their mounts and are capable of truly devastating attacks when charging.

name: Shiba Protector
shortDescription: The warriors of the Shiba family are sworn to protect the Isawa family.
shortDescriptionHtml: The warriors of the Shiba family are sworn to protect the Isawa family.

name: Elemental Warrior
shortDescription: The elemental warrior sees that great strength comes from focusing on the most basic aspects of reality.
shortDescriptionHtml: The elemental warrior sees that great strength comes from focusing on the most basic aspects of reality.

name: Shadowcraft Mage
shortDescription: Some gnomes have an even greater affinity for illusions than the average representative of their race, resulting in the prestige class known as the shadowcraft mage.
shortDescriptionHtml: Some gnomes have an even greater affinity for illusions than the average representative of their race, resulting in the prestige class known as the shadowcraft mage.

name: Outlaw of the Crimson Road
shortDescription: An outlaw of the crimson road might be a revolutionary, a loyal supporter of some deposed ruler, or merely an ordinary individual who angered the wrong person at the wrong time.
shortDescriptionHtml: An outlaw of the crimson road might be a revolutionary, a loyal supporter of some deposed ruler, or merely an ordinary individual who angered the wrong person at the wrong time.

name: Giant-killer
shortDescription: Giant-killers are great heroes so long as they are killing giants.
shortDescriptionHtml: Giant-killers are great heroes so long as they are killing giants.

name: Orc Scout
shortDescription: Part wilderness warrior and part spy, the orc scout is a hero to his people.
shortDescriptionHtml: Part wilderness warrior and part spy, the orc scout is a hero to his people.

name: Leviathan Hunter
shortDescription: The leviathan hunter is dedicated to hunting down creatures of the perilous depths.
shortDescriptionHtml: The leviathan hunter is dedicated to hunting down creatures of the perilous depths.

name: Master of Nine
shortDescription: Some savants of the Nine Disciplines believe that none of the paths are complete, true disciplines in and of themselves.
shortDescriptionHtml: Some savants of the Nine Disciplines believe that none of the paths are complete, true disciplines in and of themselves.

name: Runescarred Berserker
shortDescription: Deadly barbarians who bear magical runes carved into their flesh, runescarred berserkers are among the most feared of Rashemen's defenders.
shortDescriptionHtml: Deadly barbarians who bear magical runes carved into their flesh, runescarred berserkers are among the most feared of Rashemen's defenders.

name: Legacy Champion
shortDescription: You are so devoted to the history and chronicle of a particular item of legacy that you enjoy enhanced access to your item's legacy abilities.
shortDescriptionHtml: You are so devoted to the history and chronicle of a particular item of legacy that you enjoy enhanced access to your item's legacy abilities.

name: Eternal Order (Paladin)
shortDescription: The primary duty of the Knights of the Eternal Order--Kelemvor's main order of paladins--is to hunt and destroy powerful undead. They develop powerful undead-fighting powers by sacrificing other paladin abilities.
shortDescriptionHtml: The primary duty of the Knights of the Eternal Order—Kelemvor's main order of paladins—is to hunt and destroy powerful undead. They develop powerful undead-fighting powers by sacrificing other paladin abilities.

name: Barbarian Variant
shortDescription: A barbarian who prefers crafty hunting over pure ferocity might choose to exchange his rage ability for certain ranger class features.
shortDescriptionHtml: A barbarian who prefers crafty hunting over pure ferocity might choose to exchange his rage ability for certain ranger class features.

name: Conjurer Variant
shortDescription:
One of the most versatile schools of magic, conjuration offers its disciples an effective solution to nearly any task: Simply summon the appropriate monster and let it solve the problem. In combat, high-level conjurers fight from behind wave after wave of summoned foes, and in most battles they simply direct their summoned allies into the conflict. In addition to these vaunted summoning powers, conjuration provides effective combat spells and access to teleportation magic.

While virtually any campaign can benefit from rival groups of conjurers serving diverse agendas, conjurers are particularly effective in combat-heavy campaigns. Campaigns that feature a great deal of long-distance travel or travel between planes also benefit from including diverse groups of conjurers, because their specialty facilitates travel and encourages a thorough understanding of the creatures of the Outer Planes.

name: Enchanter Variant
shortDescription:
Charmer, schemer, deceiver, pacifist: An enchanter can be all these and more. As a practictioner of one of the most subtle schools of magic, an enchanter might charm a guard into opening a well-defended gate that fifty warriors couldn't take by force. Good-aligned enchanters use their powers to seek out truth and encourage others onto the path of good, while their evil counterparts bend others' minds at their whim and gather personal power as rapidly as possible.

Campaigns that feature a large amount of social scenarios, political intrigue, or investigation benefit greatly from the inclusion of variant enchanters. These spellcasters, skilled in the manipulation of others and capable of concealing their own identities, make excellent villains and manipulators, or even investigators skilled at using magic to draw the truth out of opponents.

Players and DMs alike should also consider the ramifications that enchantment spells and similar effects have on a game world. Is casting charm person legal? Is a character legally responsible for actions taken while charmed? Do most of the campaign's inhabitants know that enchantment effects exist? Are there folk remedies that supposedly provide protection against enchantment effects? Do they actually work? Having ready answers to these and similar questions not only adds consistency to the game, but also clarifies and highlights the role of the enchanter.

name: Transmuter Variant
shortDescription:
Masters of change, transmuters are among the most varied and versatile specialists. Transmutation spells, by their very nature, can change the environment and allow the spellcaster to solve nearly any problem.

This school's utility and variety ensures that nearly any campaign's magic becomes richer with the introduction of variant transmuters. Campaigns in which the magic system is under going change benefit from introducing variant transmuters. Likewise, campaigns that include an above-average number of magical cultures or a long history of magical sophistication benefit from alternative traditions of transmutation magic.

name: Aerial Avenger
shortDescription: A master of air combat, the aerial avenger swoops down upon his enemies like a deadly thunderbolt.
shortDescriptionHtml: A master of air combat, the aerial avenger swoops down upon his enemies like a deadly thunderbolt.

name: Harper Scout
shortDescription: Harper scouts are members of the Harpers, a secret society dedicated to holding back evil, preserving knowledge, and maintaining the balance between civilization and the wild.
shortDescriptionHtml: Harper scouts are members of the Harpers, a secret society dedicated to holding back evil, preserving knowledge, and maintaining the balance between civilization and the wild.

name: Fiend-blooded
shortDescription: With careful exploration, a spellcaster who feels a call from within can slowly bring the power of their fiendish lineage to the surface.
shortDescriptionHtml: With careful exploration, a spellcaster who feels a call from within can slowly bring the power of their fiendish lineage to the surface.

name: Magelord
shortDescription:
"So they ran me out of Secomber. They said I wasn't good enough. They said my spells were to weak. Now they will see what kind of wizard I've become. They'll see. Who'll be sorry then?" 
                                                                                                - Rimmen the Magelord

Quick to anger, haughty, and proud of his Art, the magelord is an arcane spellcaster who studies an ancient magical tradition known for extremely fast and versatile spellcasting. Sometimes a spellslinger for hire, sometimes a professional arcane duelist, the typical magelord believes he has the right to wring respect, wealth, and power from the world around him through the use of arcane force. In reality, he is little more than a cruel bandit lord who uses his magical gifts to dominate and intimidate less talented individuals.
     Like a school of fencing or a martial arts style, the magelord tradition has been passed down over the centuries from one practitioner to another. Few magelords give away such knowledge-indeed, anyone who would study this aspect of the Art must either bribe a magelord with princely gifts and service or undertake years of research to unearth ancient texts describing the techniques.
     The way of the magelord rewards ambition and recklessness, and it tends to encourage a certain contempt for the risks of power. Thus, most magelords regard their power as a tool with which to fulfill their own desires as opposed to a gift they can use to serve others. A few however, study magelord lore in hopes of using their magic against tyranny and injustive.
     Magelords are relatively rare, but societies and fellowships of them have arisen in many lands over the centuries. The most famous of these was based in the old realm of Athalantar, the Kingdom of the Staf. Bards still sing of the cruelty and evil of the magelords who ruled over the nation, evoking terrible images of a century when tyranny and deadly ambition reigned. The wizards of the Stag Kingdom were cruel, avaricious, driven men with an exceptional talent for magic. Ostensibly, they served as high officials of the realm who brutally enforced their prince's will, but in truth they ruled the Stag Kingdom from behind the throne.

name: Deepwood Sniper
shortDescription: A deepwood sniper is patient, careful, quiet , and deadly accurate.
shortDescriptionHtml: A deepwood sniper is patient, careful, quiet , and deadly accurate.

name: King/queen of the Wild
shortDescription: Where nature's fury is at its height, there you'll find the kings and queens of the wild.
shortDescriptionHtml: Where nature's fury is at its height, there you'll find the kings and queens of the wild.

name: Verdant Lord
shortDescription: The verdant lord is the final defender of the forest.
shortDescriptionHtml: The verdant lord is the final defender of the forest.

name: Hida Defender
shortDescription: Hida defenders train in great armor, a unique characteristic that fits in well with the Crab philosophy of strength and endurance. They have the stamina to fight for hours without tiring, and can hold a formation against any aggressor.
shortDescriptionHtml: Hida defenders train in great armor, a unique characteristic that fits in well with the Crab philosophy of strength and endurance. They have the stamina to fight for hours without tiring, and can hold a formation against any aggressor.

name: Evereskan Tomb Guardian
shortDescription: The Evereskan tomb guardians are on hand to ensure that the defenses of the tombs are very good indeed.
shortDescriptionHtml: The Evereskan tomb guardians are on hand to ensure that the defenses of the tombs are very good indeed.

name: Spellguard of Silverymoon
shortDescription: The Spellguard, Silverymoon's elite cadre of battle-trained arcane spellcasters, protects the city against the threat of hostile magic and aids the Knights in Silver against more mundane threats.
shortDescriptionHtml: The Spellguard, Silverymoon's elite cadre of battle-trained arcane spellcasters, protects the city against the threat of hostile magic and aids the Knights in Silver against more mundane threats.

name: Urban Soul
shortDescription: Urban souls are the chosen champions of the deity Urbanus, charged with protecting city denzens from external dangers and from subtler threats to the city.
shortDescriptionHtml: Urban souls are the chosen champions of the deity Urbanus, charged with protecting city denzens from external dangers and from subtler threats to the city.

name: Cabinet Trickster
shortDescription: Cabinet tricksters are the changeling agents of the Cabinet of Faces.
shortDescriptionHtml: Cabinet tricksters are the changeling agents of the Cabinet of Faces.

name: Deepwarden
shortDescription: Deepwardens are dwarves who serve as a living early warning system against threats from both the environment and other creatures.
shortDescriptionHtml: Deepwardens are dwarves who serve as a living early warning system against threats from both the environment and other creatures.

shortDescription: Earth dreamers move within the ancient dreams of the mountains, attuning themselves to their power and mastering strange abilities over the earth.
shortDescriptionHtml: Earth dreamers move within the ancient dreams of the mountains, attuning themselves to their power and mastering strange abilities over the earth.

name: Luckstealer
shortDescription: As a luckstealer, you're part spellcaster, part professional gambler -- and 100% mischief-maker.
shortDescriptionHtml: As a luckstealer, you're part spellcaster, part professional gambler — and 100% mischief-maker.

name: Whisperknife
shortDescription: The halfling whisperknife seeks to repay murder, theft, or humiliation in the same coin.
shortDescriptionHtml: The halfling whisperknife seeks to repay murder, theft, or humiliation in the same coin.

name: Warmaster
shortDescription: Warmasters are trained at the College of War and can become a formidable presence on the battlefield.
shortDescriptionHtml: Warmasters are trained at the College of War and can become a formidable presence on the battlefield.

name: Serene Guardian
shortDescription: Those who master the esoteric, mind-enhancing techniques of the Luminous Order have earned the right to call themselves serene guardians.
shortDescriptionHtml: Those who master the esoteric, mind-enhancing techniques of the Luminous Order have earned the right to call themselves serene guardians.

name: Coiled Cabalist
shortDescription: Standing apart from the priests of Sseth but careful never to draw their collective ire by openly opposing them, the members of the Coiled Cabal pursue the arcane arts largely in secrecy.
shortDescriptionHtml: Standing apart from the priests of Sseth but careful never to draw their collective ire by openly opposing them, the members of the Coiled Cabal pursue the arcane arts largely in secrecy.

name: Fang of Sseth
shortDescription: The Fangs of Sseth constitute the strike force of the Vipers -- the stealthy killers who leave no trace.
shortDescriptionHtml: The Fangs of Sseth constitute the strike force of the Vipers — the stealthy killers who leave no trace.

name: Illithid Savant
shortDescription: The illithid savant is an academic who deals in applied science, acquiring new knowledge from the brains he consumes.
shortDescriptionHtml: The illithid savant is an academic who deals in applied science, acquiring new knowledge from the brains he consumes.

name: Noctumancer
shortDescription: Noctumancers bridge the gap between shadow and arcane magic.
shortDescriptionHtml: Noctumancers bridge the gap between shadow and arcane magic.

name: Inquisitor of the Drowning Goddess
shortDescription: Some kuo-toa monks go on to become inquisitors of the Drowning Goddess, who are tasked with protecting the community from inside threats.
shortDescriptionHtml: Some kuo-toa monks go on to become inquisitors of the Drowning Goddess, who are tasked with protecting the community from inside threats.

name: Crescent Moon Knight (Paladin)
shortDescription: These unusual paladins of the Order of the Crescent Moon serve either Clangeddin Silverbeard or Sel�ne. The order was founded by an alliance between humans and dwarves to defeat marauding lycanthropes; now, the descendants of the founders teach old family skills and pass heirlooms to the next generation of defenders.

name: Evoker Variant
shortDescription:
Masters of the raw power of magical energy, evokers can turn the tide of a battle with a single powerful spell, leveling groups of foes faster than any other practitioner of magic. Where some wizards focus on careful spell preparation and protective spells to survive combat encounters, evokers simply blast away with powerful energy attacks. Their prodigious offensive abilities ensure that evokers become the center of an adventuring group's battle plan.

Campaigns that include large numbers of wizards aligned to different nations are particularly suitable for variant evokers, since each nation develops unique cadres of evokers to serve in battle. Groups of militant evokers marching in unison with more conventional groups can change the tide of nearly any battle. In addition, campaigns that include themes of primal energy, raw nature, or extreme elemental conditions can all benefit from introducing evokers with variant abilities. Evokers in these sorts of campaigns might explore the raw essence of magic, struggling to harness its energies in new and unique ways.

name: Necromancer Variant
shortDescription:
Wrapped in mystery and burdened by reputations of evil, necromancers control dangerous energies that rob the living of strength and grant unlife to the dead. The most powerful necromancers command dangerous undead minions and threaten towns, cities, and sometimes even entire kingdoms with their power. Although necromancers make excellent villains and nemeses for a group of adventurers, neutral- and good-aligned necromancers who view themselves as the shepherds of the living and guardians of the dead can also prove valuable allies.

Campaigns that include evil necromancers or groups of undead as antagonists can benefit from the inclusion of variant necromancers. Rival groups of necromancers might view certain types of undead as the only true or "pure" undead and all others as evils that must be destroyed, with each group disagreeing on which types are which. Other factions or groups might have an innate loathing for undead raised by any but themselves.
